ReviewContent: I'm one of those weird people where sleep aides don't work or wire me. I struggle to fall asleep because I can't shut off my brain. I've tried so many things to no avail.  I started looking into natural things and came across these and decided to try them. To my surprise they have worked wonders! I take them 15 mins or so before bed and I fall sleep quickly. No more tossing and turning for hrs watching the clock and knowing tomorrow is going to suck. I went from on average getting 5-6 hrs of sleep a night to almost 8 hrs of sleep every night. They taste alright, work fast and I wake up ready to tackle the day.  So if you're struggling to fall asleep or can't find anything that helps try these.  10/10 recommend.
ReviewTitle: When nothing else has worked, these did.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

Just a couple of these gummies before bed and I find myself drifting off to sleep much faster and staying asleep throughout the night.The blend of natural ingredients like melatonin, chamomile, and passionflower seems to work wonders in calming my mind and preparing me for a restful night’s sleep. ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: As someone who has struggled with getting a good night's rest, I've been on a quest to find the perfect sleep aid. Well, I'm thrilled to report that I've finally found the winning combination: OLLY Sleep Gummies paired with Sleepy Cocoa!Let's start with the Olly Sleep Gummies. These little gems have been a game changer for me. The blend of Melatonin, L-Theanine, and soothing botanicals like Chamomile and Lemon Balm has been incredibly effective in helping me relax and drift off to sleep. I love the fact that they are non-habit forming, and the Blackberry Zen flavor is just delightful – a treat for the taste buds before bed. Taking two gummies 30 minutes before sleep has become a sacred ritual in my nighttime routine.Now, let's talk about Sleepy Cocoa. I stumbled upon this product while searching for a melatonin-free option to complement the gummies. Sleepy Cocoa, with its blend of GABA, magnesium, and cherry tart extract, is the perfect partner. It's not only delicious, but also soothing and comforting. I love curling up with a warm cup of this rich, creamy hot chocolate before bed. The fact that it's melatonin-free means I can enjoy it alongside my Olly gummies without worrying about overdoing it with melatonin.Together, these two products have revolutionized my bedtime routine. I start with the Olly Gummies, then prepare my Sleepy Cocoa as I wind down with a book or some light music. The combination of the gummies' natural sleep aids and the calming supplements of the cocoa creates a relaxing atmosphere that prepares my body and mind for sleep. I've noticed a significant improvement in the time it takes for me to fall asleep, and the quality of my sleep has greatly improved. I wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated, without any grogginess.The ingredient selection for both products has been outstanding, and I appreciate the attention to detail in their formulation – no artificial colors or flavors, and gluten-free options cater to health-conscious consumers like me.In conclusion, if you're struggling with sleep, I highly recommend giving Olly Sleep Gummies and Sleepy Cocoa a try. This dynamic duo has been the key to unlocking restful, peaceful nights for me. Sweet dreams are made of these, indeed!
ReviewTitle: The Ultimate Duo for Blissful Sleep: OLLY Gummies & Sleepy Cocoa!

ReviewContent: Heard a lot of good things about these sleep gummies, so finally decided it was time to give them a try. I ALWAYS have a hard time falling asleep. ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Okay, listen up y’all.These. Are. Amazing.Let me start by explaining, I am a huge insomniac. I’m a night owl so, that alone makes it harder for me to go to sleep cuz I’d rather be up at night, which means I subconsciously fight sleep lol. That, coupled with my anxiety issues and my complete inability to shut off my mind, keeps me awake into the wee hours of the morning.I do have an Rx sleep aid (Seroquel). It’s not a sleeping pill, per se, rather, it is an anxiety med that causes drowsiness. I used to be able to take 1 pill and go to sleep, but I can’t anymore. I have to take anywhere between 3-4 to fall asleep.Until I bought these.I was very skeptical because it takes so much prescription strength medicine to get me to sleep; how could an “all natural” supplement get me to sleep?! But, figured I’d give it a try...what did I have to lose besides $16???So glad I did! I take 2 of these to get me into a sleepy mood. I start getting a little groggy, just a normal sleepy, nothing too heavy or “forceful”. About an hour later I take 1 of my sleeping pills - ONE!!! And a third one of these and I’m asleep within the hour.I sleep restfully (no more tossing and turning) and I feel amazing in the morning. Eventually, I plan to wean myself off the sleeping pills altogether but I’ve only been taking these for a week now so I’ll get there eventually.The taste is slightly bitter but blackberries aren’t the sweetest fruit (IMO) so I wouldn’t expect these to be super sweet either. They don’t taste bad by any means, just not quite as sweet as the other 2 Olly vitamins I take.Trust me when I say, if these can get ME, of all people, to sleep, they can get anyone to sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I'd give Olly Sleep 10 stars if I could!! This stuff works absolutely amazing! This is my first time trying Olly Sleep and the results are amazing! Before taking Olly Sleep I've tried Vicks Zzzquil and it just honestly hasn't been the best results. So I thought I'd give Olly Sleep a shot and the results are freaking amazing!! I only take 1 Gummy which contains 1.5mg of melatonin and within 10 to 15min its got me knocked out and I sleep like a rock! I have a Samsung Watch 4 so it records my sleep and was bought for the reason. And my sleep score has went from 40's to 50's to now in the 80's and 90's! Less movement/awake time during the night, a total of only 23min when usually it's over an hour. My deep sleep could improve as it was 33min, but that's not from the gummies, that's more so from just myself because I got almost 2 hours of REM sleep aka dreaming stage, and I got 4hrs and 8min of light sleep. Will have to try going to sleep sooner and see if I can get more sleep. Lol. I dream every night, always had very vivid dreams! It's amazing and I love it! I hope it never changes! The Olly Sleep doesn't leave me groggy but it does take me a min to get out of bed lol. I haven't slept this hard in a long time! But thank you Olly Sleep, you have really improved my sleep! 10 stars all around if I could give it!! It's a MUST TRY! Also, the taste isn't bad at all. If you like Blackberries, you'll love these, plus they are quick to chew and down they go.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: As someone who has struggled with getting a good night's rest, I've been on a quest to find the perfect sleep aid. Well, I'm thrilled to report that I've finally found the winning combination: OLLY Sleep Gummies paired with Sleepy Cocoa!Let's start with the Olly Sleep Gummies. These little gems have been a game changer for me. The blend of Melatonin, L-Theanine, and soothing botanicals like Chamomile and Lemon Balm has been incredibly effective in helping me relax and drift off to sleep. I love the fact that they are non-habit forming, and the Blackberry Zen flavor is just delightful – a treat for the taste buds before bed. Taking two gummies 30 minutes before sleep has become a sacred ritual in my nighttime routine.Now, let's talk about Sleepy Cocoa. I stumbled upon this product while searching for a melatonin-free option to complement the gummies. Sleepy Cocoa, with its blend of GABA, magnesium, and cherry tart extract, is the perfect partner. It's not only delicious, but also soothing and comforting. I love curling up with a warm cup of this rich, creamy hot chocolate before bed. The fact that it's melatonin-free means I can enjoy it alongside my Olly gummies without worrying about overdoing it with melatonin.Together, these two products have revolutionized my bedtime routine. I start with the Olly Gummies, then prepare my Sleepy Cocoa as I wind down with a book or some light music. The combination of the gummies' natural sleep aids and the calming supplements of the cocoa creates a relaxing atmosphere that prepares my body and mind for sleep. I've noticed a significant improvement in the time it takes for me to fall asleep, and the quality of my sleep has greatly improved. I wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated, without any grogginess.The ingredient selection for both products has been outstanding, and I appreciate the attention to detail in their formulation – no artificial colors or flavors, and gluten-free options cater to health-conscious consumers like me.In conclusion, if you're struggling with sleep, I highly recommend giving Olly Sleep Gummies and Sleepy Cocoa a try. This dynamic duo has been the key to unlocking restful, peaceful nights for me. Sweet dreams are made of these, indeed!
ReviewTitle: The Ultimate Duo for Blissful Sleep: OLLY Gummies & Sleepy Cocoa!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My experience is not to downplay this product but is to share with others to make you aware that every thing is not for everybody. My experience trying this product was very very scary. Before I purchased it I read all of the reviews the majority were positive and just a few negative experiences. For me my experience was very scary. After 20 minutes of taking the product could have been 15 minutes of taking the product I began to feel real nauseated severely nauseated and extremely dizzy. So I thought I better Google to see what the side effects this product may have and both were listed, may cause dizziness and nausea. I became so sick I thought I was going to actually have to go to ER but I got enough strength to go to my bedroom and lay down for a while and the nausea and the dizziness just intensified. This is all true this is not a makeup story. This is my personal experience of trying this product. Again this is not to downplay the product because everybody body operates and functions differently. After laying down praying God don't let me die take away this feeling and finally I got up and was able to get something salty to try to kind of help the nausea. I drink some water and got something a little salty that helped a little bit. And finally I fell a little bit better and after a couple hours then I felt finally fell asleep. But after getting up this morning I feel a whole lot better than what I did last night but I still feel the residue of the nausea real sensitive stomach and still a little bit of dizziness. So again I'm sharing this to say do your research you know the only way you got to know more or less per se is to try it but if you know that you may be a little sensitive I wouldn't give it a try. I've used other products by OLLY and they have been very beneficial but I never tried the ones as a sleep aid. The product isn't cheap and I spent close to $80 or $70 dollars, but because I feel so much better today, I can care less about getting a refund. That's, just how sick it made me. Hopefully, it Works for you!

ReviewContent: Okay, so yes, we see the title, we allllll see it. Don't get me wrong, this stuff works but I had to eat four instead of the recommended two for results. Now, I'm a college student, 5ft11 and 175lbs. I've never needed sleeping aides before but insomnia in college, especially in this day and age, is a given so I wanted to try something non-addictive.It has a pleasant, slightly minty taste. Fun to chew with the little quirky aftertaste I always expect from oral supplements. I tried two one day and didn't sleep much different. I did this a couple more times throughout the month just to see if the first time was a fluke and didn't see much difference. However, I tried four and slept like a baby!I'm not advocating over-usage so don't put that on me. But considering my body mass index, I might actually need four and be okay. If you've got less meat on your bones, definitely start out with two. Then try three or four if you're not satisfied or if you're a little larger.But be careful, and don't let the bed bugs bite

ReviewContent: The media could not be loaded.                                                                                            I’ve been taking Olly Sleep for a few months now. I take a dose on the nights that I can’t sleep (due to insomnia). I usually take them about half an hour before my intended bedtime. About half an hour to one hour, with Olly, I’m sound asleep and sleep through the night. I wake up well rested, too!The only thing I don’t like about Olly’s Sleep gummies is the sweetness as I find it too sweet/sugary.Other than that, I really like them, and I’ll most like buy them again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have been using Olly sleep gummies for about 5+ years now and have never had a problem and have even purchased them mostly from Amazon. This last purchase I received was odd.. I opened the lid and the seal and it smelled like chemicals or rubbing alcohol almost? It’s made me really nervous to eat them and I think I might throw them out honestly. The top of the bottle under the seal was also liquid-y and seemed like it tinted the lip of the container. I still had my old bottle of the same product and checked everything thinking maybe this was one of amazons sham products but it looks legit sadly. Only difference I noticed was the ingredients list. The old one had beet sugar, like in the description here, and the new package has sugar water instead. Not sure how big of a difference that could make but it’s the only thing that I see different. Giving 2 stars because everything seems legit, just a horrible smell when opened. Will be throwing away as I don’t want to risk ingesting something I shouldn’t.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I Love OLLY products (like Daily Energy) but not this one. It tastes bad, mild difficulty to chew and only has 3mg of Melatonin ~ a child's dose. Much better products out there for sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I cannot rate these highly enough. I’ve had sleep issues the last 9 years or so, about the time I got diagnosed with hashimotos disease. I am generally extremely tired and low energy during the day, yet I lay there at night unable to fall asleep and it’s just a horrible cycle that ends with me staying awake mostly for days at a time or getting very little sleep until I eventually crash. And relying on caffeine to get through the day and workouts even though my doctor says my thyroid levels are “balanced”. I’ve tried many other sleep aids and melatonin that has done NOTHING for me, so I was very weary to try this, but I bought a bottle of it just to see as I have many other times. Well, it’s day 4 of using it and I’ve actually SLEPT. And I mean 8 hours of sleep, waking up actually energized. Man, do I hope this lasts, it has been a godsend. Give it 30-60 minutes, lay down and relax and you will get TIRED. Also love Ollys fiber gummies. But, this is the first time my sleep watch has said I am 100% sleep charged and I am so excited.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Update: Amazon will not take the return, but OLLY sent me two new (perfect) bottles at no charge, just have to go through their customer service with your Amazon order #. // Not returnable, even when it arrives damaged with under the lid covered in a gross gel-like substance. Gross.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My review may be a little premature since I've only used the product twice but I am so happy with the results so far! The first night I took 1 instead of the recommended 2 and slept perfectly. I still woke up to a work call but was able to get right back to sleep. Second night I took 2 and woke up in the same spot I fell asleep. I by no means have insomnia or anything of that sort, I just find myself stressing out about everything at bedtime and can't fall asleep. Once I do, I toss and turn and get up several times but can always fall back to sleep. These gummies gave me 2 nights of beautiful sleep and I'm thankful. I woke up at my usual time without an alarm and dont feel groggy at all. I highly recommend these! I'm going to buy more so I dont run out!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This is my second time buying these, and I was nervous based on previous reviews about them arriving melted. They came from Amazon in a box with a cooler pouch and ice packs inside to keep them cool! So it looks to me like they’ve sorted out the issues with shipping to make sure they arrive in separate pieces.As for the product itself, I’m very happy with it. I usually drink a bedtime tea (Republic of Tea - Lady Cora’s Evening Blend or Chamomile Lemon, which is the same tea), but on nights that I work late and don’t want to stay up to drink a cuppa, these gummies are a fantastic alternative. They help me for sure, which surprised me, because melatonin didn’t help me at all years ago when I tried it. I’m a lifelong insomniac, and I stay asleep so much better when I take these.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Okay hear me out! These are amazing! I began taking them recently as a new option for BETTER COMFORTABLE SLEEP without feeling like I am hungover the next morning. In the past I had tried Zzzquil, which is absolutely horrible because it makes me stop breathing and that wakes me up and I wake up feeling beat up. Regular melatonin makes me wake up several times during the night and I toss and turn throughout, and I also wake up feeling beat. These gummies have literally made me feel so much better not only when I wake up which is absolutely amazing because I feel rested, but I fall asleep faster and comfortably and I don’t wake up or toss and turn.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Most nights I only need one chewy. But dosage for 3 mg is two. So my bottle lasts twice as long. Sometimes less is better, its a *itch to lower dosage. So start low. In the past I worked myself up to 10mg. Thats the recommended highest dosage.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have been having trouble sleeping for the last few months and have recently started experimenting with melatonin. I find that it makes me tired, but my mind doesn't turn off, so I still don't fall asleep easily. I decided to try Olly Sleep to see if the extra ingredients would help with that aspect.I took only one gummy (instead of the serving size of two) and was amazed by how quickly my racing mind turned off. I fell asleep, hard... so much so that I turned off my alarm in my sleep and slept in TWO hours! Needless to say, I think one gummy may be too much for me (at 130 lbs, if that helps anyone). I think I will need to go down to 1/2 a gummy next time!
ReviewTitle: Amazing, but I turned off my alarm in my sleep!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I'm always looking for help to get to sleep, these do help when you do get to sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have trouble falling asleep and staying asleep. I am not a big fan of melatonin but decided to give these a try. Although the taste isn’t the best these gummies really do work. I usually get tired within 30 minutes to an hour after taking them. I have no had any side effects. Since I am smaller I usually only take one or two early at night so I don’t wake up tired

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: It's a game changer for anyone struggling with occasional sleeplessness. As someone who's tried various sleep aids, I was pleasantly surprised by the effectiveness of these gummies.First and foremost, let's talk about the taste. They're decent enough that I actually look forward to taking them before bed.But what matters most is the results, and I'm happy to report that these gummies deliver. Within about 30 minutes of taking them, I start to feel relaxed and ready for sleep. I fall asleep faster and stay asleep throughout the night, waking up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.Overall, these gummies is a fantastic option for anyone looking for a natural and effective way to support their sleep. Say goodbye to restless nights and hello to sweet dreams. Highly recommended.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: It is not sweet. Chewy and helps with my other routine for sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I tried few melatonin gummy and this one is effective on me. I starts to feel sleepy in around 30 mins but if I don't go to bed, it will wear off. Of coz it cannot compare with sleeping pills but I wish it's a more "healthy" alternative.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My experience is not to downplay this product but is to share with others to make you aware that every thing is not for everybody. My experience trying this product was very very scary. Before I purchased it I read all of the reviews the majority were positive and just a few negative experiences. For me my experience was very scary. After 20 minutes of taking the product could have been 15 minutes of taking the product I began to feel real nauseated severely nauseated and extremely dizzy. So I thought I better Google to see what the side effects this product may have and both were listed, may cause dizziness and nausea. I became so sick I thought I was going to actually have to go to ER but I got enough strength to go to my bedroom and lay down for a while and the nausea and the dizziness just intensified. This is all true this is not a makeup story. This is my personal experience of trying this product. Again this is not to downplay the product because everybody body operates and functions differently. After laying down praying God don't let me die take away this feeling and finally I got up and was able to get something salty to try to kind of help the nausea. I drink some water and got something a little salty that helped a little bit. And finally I fell a little bit better and after a couple hours then I felt finally fell asleep. But after getting up this morning I feel a whole lot better than what I did last night but I still feel the residue of the nausea real sensitive stomach and still a little bit of dizziness. So again I'm sharing this to say do your research you know the only way you got to know more or less per se is to try it but if you know that you may be a little sensitive I wouldn't give it a try. I've used other products by OLLY and they have been very beneficial but I never tried the ones as a sleep aid. The product isn't cheap and I spent close to $80 or $70 dollars, but because I feel so much better today, I can care less about getting a refund. That's, just how sick it made me. Hopefully, it Works for you!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I take two every night as recommended by my sister who recommended them. She feels they help her but I sent zero difference after taking these. I have a hard time staying asleep at night and maybe these really only help with falling asleep, I don’t know. That being said, they are quite tasty and I don’t regret trying them. I just don’t see myself buying them again since they don’t do what I hoped they would.
ReviewTitle: Don’t notice any chance in sleep, but are yummy

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I only need to take 1 and I can drift to sleep.  Only down side is the vivid dreams! I dreamt I owed a friend $608 and was about to write her a check lol

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These guys work wonders if you’re afraid of flying. Eat two and you’re sleeping through the whole flight and then some (helps with jet lag).However, if you take two be prepared for some weird dreams.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: As in the title of the review, I ate two, waited an hour but never fell a sleep… took 3 more, it took a while to drift off but in the morning, I felt great.  Not the typical, grogginess wishing I could sleep longer sort of morning.  I hope I don’t need 5-6 of these every night but if so then at least I know the mornings will be pleasant. As reference, I am a 60yo male, very active, most nights it is my active brain that keeps me awake.  I use brown noise in the background and sleep next to the love of my life.  I am employed, earn well, good job and no health issues… just a very active mind. I hope this helps you choose.
ReviewTitle: Did not get me to sleep faster but felt good

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I had high hopes for these when I purchased them.  Wow! What a disappointment.  I read the reviews here and went with the ones that said these are what they needed to help them get to sleep and stay asleep with no side effects in the am. Here I am, 6 days in and up well before my alarm is set to go off. I took the recommended 2 gummies the first night. I did get sleepy but not sure if that was my really the gummies or my body.  4 hrs later I was awake. Maybe I took them too early, I thought to myself. Waited until 9pm the next night. Awake at 2am. 3rd night I took 3 gummies. I NEED SOME SLEEP!!! 4th, 5th and now the 6th night is a repeat show I can't stop. Needless to say, I either need a therapist, a doctor or stronger sleeping pills.  These gummies are no match for my body. Research will be done this weekend.  Good luck to you if you are considering buying them. Genuine good luck.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: One gummy or two, they work fast, especially when you lie down and relax.  Two leaves me feeling groggy upon waking.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These have saved me. I had a hysterectomy and was experiencing menopausal symptoms, with insomnia being the absolute WORST. Nothing was helping, NyQuil zzz, benadryl, hormones.... nothing. Lack of sleep will drive you insane after a while. Thought I was losing my mind. These were a last resort because I've tried melatonin before and it didn't help. But this combo works for some reason. I'm getting a full nights sleep for the first time in a while, thank God! Give it a chance, the first night I def felt groggy the next day, but again.. lack of sleep will do that. Takes more than a day to catch up. Start with one instead of 2. They relax me to sleep and I get a deep rest too, and I'm used to them now so I feel great the next morning. Love these!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I love these, been having trouble sleeping..mostly because my partner snores.. but I take two of these and I’m out for about 6 hours. I still wake up after 6 hours usually, but when I do actually sleep it solid and I still feel well rested.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I'm not sure how many years I've consumed these - I've gotten so used to the flavor I start craving it as a sweet treat before bed! (down side is the sugar, I admit, but I don't usually eat much sugar, except for chocolate, and that's medicinal anyway) Other melatonin blends make me miss this one! I'm happy that they add the other ingredients, really relaxing. I eat one dose per evening, even though it's suggested to eat 2 gummies. I'm not a gummy fan, this is the exception for sure! ThanX Olly, you're my fave!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Lo he probado yo y varios amigos y mi conclusión es que para la noche te acaban durmiendo de 30 a 40 minutos tomando solo una te relajara y te dará un buen sueño pero por experiencia si lo que no quieres es levantarte durante la noche recomiendo 2 gomitas.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I got these as they are supposed to help with anxiety and help you sleep. I think they work ok but they are pricey compared to other brands. eating the dose puts me to sleep in an hour and I do perceive myself having some relief from anxiety. That being said if all you want is sleep then I would suggest other similary products that are cheaper and faster acting. If you want the anxiety help and sleep help then these may fit your need, but again I am not fully convinced they are worth what I paid for them. As for taste they are good enough as I am not eating these for pleasure. they wont make you gag so thats all I ask for.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Another great OLLY product!I've had the hard little melatonin pills and tried several different brands. I started taking the OLLY gummies on the recommendation of a doctor who told me they might absorb differently if my body doesn't seem to respond to the hard pills. I know, it's the same substance, but the OLLY gummies just work better for me. They are easier to take.They don't taste as artificial and have a pleasant lemony aftertaste. They remind of a cup of fruit tea with honey and lemon. So if you are hoping they'll taste like candy, be aware they might not fit that bill. That being said, I AM a gummy/Haribo aficionado and find the taste quite pleasant. It's just different from candy. I can get my teenager to take them when she gets herself sleep deprived and they work really well for her as well.
ReviewTitle: These WORK. Absorb better, easier to take.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have been using Olly sleep gummies for about 5+ years now and have never had a problem and have even purchased them mostly from Amazon. This last purchase I received was odd.. I opened the lid and the seal and it smelled like chemicals or rubbing alcohol almost? It’s made me really nervous to eat them and I think I might throw them out honestly. The top of the bottle under the seal was also liquid-y and seemed like it tinted the lip of the container. I still had my old bottle of the same product and checked everything thinking maybe this was one of amazons sham products but it looks legit sadly. Only difference I noticed was the ingredients list. The old one had beet sugar, like in the description here, and the new package has sugar water instead. Not sure how big of a difference that could make but it’s the only thing that I see different. Giving 2 stars because everything seems legit, just a horrible smell when opened. Will be throwing away as I don’t want to risk ingesting something I shouldn’t.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I Love OLLY products (like Daily Energy) but not this one. It tastes bad, mild difficulty to chew and only has 3mg of Melatonin ~ a child's dose. Much better products out there for sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These gummies are super tasty (almost too tasty) and work great! Sometimes it gives me pretty wild dreams  too, and I've heard similar reports from friends that have tried them. They're pricier than other ones on the market but worth it; I once tried a cheaper brand and they were disgusting. I'll never betray Olly again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These thing work great! I can only compare to another cheap brand that I’ve tried but these are 3 times better than they were. I fall  asleep within 30 minutes and sleep well. After my purchase I found they also make an extra strength which is what I use now. I began waking in the middle of the night with the originals and no longer have the issue with the higher strength. These are 3mg of melatonin while the extra strength are 5mg. And they are only like 2$ more for the same number if gummies.  I still purchase these for my daughter who like me has a hard time falling asleep. Start with one gummy and see how it works for you and take the lowest possible dose then increase as needed i dont need the max dose in the xs and it saves gummies and money. hope this helps

ReviewContent: I have tried everything know to man as a sleep aid. I guess the darkness tells your brain it's bedtime and then the gummies do their job. I set my TV on a sleep timer and I fall asleep within 1 or half of the 2nd episode of whatever 30 minute show I have on.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

The gummies are also a great flavour.You get what you pay for in this product... even though I wish it was a little cheaper.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I don't know which of the ingredients "didn't agree with me," as my grandmother used to say. It definitely made me very sleepy (took only one) and quickly. Unfortunately, I also felt out of breath and I got a bad headache and felt nauseous.Besides melatonin, the gummies contain L-Theanine, chamomile extract, passionflower extract, lemon balm extract, and then other ingredients for the gummy part I guess, such as glucose, beet sugar, gelatin, coloring from carrot and blueberrie juices, pectin, coconut oil and carnauba wax (hmmm, they used to put that in car wax back in the day).So, it could be my body had a reaction to one or more of these ingredients .  I'm not aware of any allergies to any of the ingredients, so I don't know.  I gave the product a rating of 4 stars only because of that. The company itself provides great customer service. I got a reply to my email very quickly and I got a full refund for the bottle of 110 gummies. That says a lot about their integrity.
ReviewTitle: I had a reaction to the gummies but customer support was great

I take two about an hour before going to bed and I sleep like a baby and have been doing so for about 6 months now. ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: It's a game changer for anyone struggling with occasional sleeplessness. As someone who's tried various sleep aids, I was pleasantly surprised by the effectiveness of these gummies.First and foremost, let's talk about the taste. They're decent enough that I actually look forward to taking them before bed.But what matters most is the results, and I'm happy to report that these gummies deliver. Within about 30 minutes of taking them, I start to feel relaxed and ready for sleep. I fall asleep faster and stay asleep throughout the night, waking up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.Overall, these gummies is a fantastic option for anyone looking for a natural and effective way to support their sleep. Say goodbye to restless nights and hello to sweet dreams. Highly recommended.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My experience is not to downplay this product but is to share with others to make you aware that every thing is not for everybody. My experience trying this product was very very scary. Before I purchased it I read all of the reviews the majority were positive and just a few negative experiences. For me my experience was very scary. After 20 minutes of taking the product could have been 15 minutes of taking the product I began to feel real nauseated severely nauseated and extremely dizzy. So I thought I better Google to see what the side effects this product may have and both were listed, may cause dizziness and nausea. I became so sick I thought I was going to actually have to go to ER but I got enough strength to go to my bedroom and lay down for a while and the nausea and the dizziness just intensified. This is all true this is not a makeup story. This is my personal experience of trying this product. Again this is not to downplay the product because everybody body operates and functions differently. After laying down praying God don't let me die take away this feeling and finally I got up and was able to get something salty to try to kind of help the nausea. I drink some water and got something a little salty that helped a little bit. And finally I fell a little bit better and after a couple hours then I felt finally fell asleep. But after getting up this morning I feel a whole lot better than what I did last night but I still feel the residue of the nausea real sensitive stomach and still a little bit of dizziness. So again I'm sharing this to say do your research you know the only way you got to know more or less per se is to try it but if you know that you may be a little sensitive I wouldn't give it a try. I've used other products by OLLY and they have been very beneficial but I never tried the ones as a sleep aid. The product isn't cheap and I spent close to $80 or $70 dollars, but because I feel so much better today, I can care less about getting a refund. That's, just how sick it made me. Hopefully, it Works for you!

ReviewContent: Got fully refound.

The top of the bottle under the seal was also liquid-y and seemed like it tinted the lip of the container. I still had my old bottle of the same product and checked everything thinking maybe this was one of amazons sham products but it looks legit sadly. Only difference I noticed was the ingredients list. The old one had beet sugar, like in the description here, and the new package has sugar water instead. Not sure how big of a difference that could make but it’s the only thing that I see different. Giving 2 stars because everything seems legit, just a horrible smell when opened. Will be throwing away as I don’t want to risk ingesting something I shouldn’t.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: As someone who has struggled with getting a good night's rest, I've been on a quest to find the perfect sleep aid. Well, I'm thrilled to report that I've finally found the winning combination: OLLY Sleep Gummies paired with Sleepy Cocoa!Let's start with the Olly Sleep Gummies. These little gems have been a game changer for me. The blend of Melatonin, L-Theanine, and soothing botanicals like Chamomile and Lemon Balm has been incredibly effective in helping me relax and drift off to sleep. I love the fact that they are non-habit forming, and the Blackberry Zen flavor is just delightful – a treat for the taste buds before bed. Taking two gummies 30 minutes before sleep has become a sacred ritual in my nighttime routine.Now, let's talk about Sleepy Cocoa. I stumbled upon this product while searching for a melatonin-free option to complement the gummies. Sleepy Cocoa, with its blend of GABA, magnesium, and cherry tart extract, is the perfect partner. It's not only delicious, but also soothing and comforting. I love curling up with a warm cup of this rich, creamy hot chocolate before bed. The fact that it's melatonin-free means I can enjoy it alongside my Olly gummies without worrying about overdoing it with melatonin.Together, these two products have revolutionized my bedtime routine. I start with the Olly Gummies, then prepare my Sleepy Cocoa as I wind down with a book or some light music. The combination of the gummies' natural sleep aids and the calming supplements of the cocoa creates a relaxing atmosphere that prepares my body and mind for sleep. I've noticed a significant improvement in the time it takes for me to fall asleep, and the quality of my sleep has greatly improved. I wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated, without any grogginess.The ingredient selection for both products has been outstanding, and I appreciate the attention to detail in their formulation – no artificial colors or flavors, and gluten-free options cater to health-conscious consumers like me.In conclusion, if you're struggling with sleep, I highly recommend giving Olly Sleep Gummies and Sleepy Cocoa a try. This dynamic duo has been the key to unlocking restful, peaceful nights for me. Sweet dreams are made of these, indeed!
ReviewTitle: The Ultimate Duo for Blissful Sleep: OLLY Gummies & Sleepy Cocoa!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Okay, listen up y’all.These. Are. Amazing.Let me start by explaining, I am a huge insomniac. I’m a night owl so, that alone makes it harder for me to go to sleep cuz I’d rather be up at night, which means I subconsciously fight sleep lol. That, coupled with my anxiety issues and my complete inability to shut off my mind, keeps me awake into the wee hours of the morning.I do have an Rx sleep aid (Seroquel). It’s not a sleeping pill, per se, rather, it is an anxiety med that causes drowsiness. I used to be able to take 1 pill and go to sleep, but I can’t anymore. I have to take anywhere between 3-4 to fall asleep.Until I bought these.I was very skeptical because it takes so much prescription strength medicine to get me to sleep; how could an “all natural” supplement get me to sleep?! But, figured I’d give it a try...what did I have to lose besides $16???So glad I did! I take 2 of these to get me into a sleepy mood. I start getting a little groggy, just a normal sleepy, nothing too heavy or “forceful”. About an hour later I take 1 of my sleeping pills - ONE!!! And a third one of these and I’m asleep within the hour.I sleep restfully (no more tossing and turning) and I feel amazing in the morning. Eventually, I plan to wean myself off the sleeping pills altogether but I’ve only been taking these for a week now so I’ll get there eventually.The taste is slightly bitter but blackberries aren’t the sweetest fruit (IMO) so I wouldn’t expect these to be super sweet either. They don’t taste bad by any means, just not quite as sweet as the other 2 Olly vitamins I take.Trust me when I say, if these can get ME, of all people, to sleep, they can get anyone to sleep

I love the fact that they are non-habit forming, and the Blackberry Zen flavor is just delightful – a treat for the taste buds before bed. Taking two gummies 30 minutes before sleep has become a sacred ritual in my nighttime routine.Now, let's talk about Sleepy Cocoa. I stumbled upon this product while searching for a melatonin-free option to complement the gummies. Sleepy Cocoa, with its blend of GABA, magnesium, and cherry tart extract, is the perfect partner. The fact that it's melatonin-free means I can enjoy it alongside my Olly gummies without worrying about overdoing it with melatonin.Together, these two products have revolutionized my bedtime routine. I start with the Olly Gummies, then prepare my Sleepy Cocoa as I wind down with a book or some light music. The combination of the gummies' natural sleep aids and the calming supplements of the cocoa creates a relaxing atmosphere that prepares my body and mind for sleep. I've noticed a significant improvement in the time it takes for me to fall asleep, and the quality of my sleep has greatly improved. I wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated, without any grogginess.The ingredient selection for both products has been outstanding, and I appreciate the attention to detail in their formulation – no artificial colors or flavors, and gluten-free options cater to health-conscious consumers like me.In conclusion, if you're struggling with sleep, I highly recommend giving Olly Sleep Gummies and Sleepy Cocoa a try. This dynamic duo has been the key to unlocking restful, peaceful nights for me. Sweet dreams are made of these, indeed!

ReviewContent: I cannot rate these highly enough. I’ve had sleep issues the last 9 years or so, about the time I got diagnosed with hashimotos disease. And relying on caffeine to get through the day and workouts even though my doctor says my thyroid levels are “balanced”. I’ve tried many other sleep aids and melatonin that has done NOTHING for me, so I was very weary to try this, but I bought a bottle of it just to see as I have many other times. Well, it’s day 4 of using it and I’ve actually SLEPT. And I mean 8 hours of sleep, waking up actually energized. Man, do I hope this lasts, it has been a godsend. Give it 30-60 minutes, lay down and relax and you will get TIRED. Also love Ollys fiber gummies. But, this is the first time my sleep watch has said I am 100% sleep charged and I am so excited.
