ReviewContent: Me hizo falta más investigación, ya que el producto ayuda a que te de sueño y te quedes dormido pronto, lo cual hace excelentemente, sin embargo no te ayuda a mantenerte dormido.  Para mantenerte dormido necesitas productos con Glicinato de Magnesio.
ReviewTitle: Ayuda a que te de sueño.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Better sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Love using this product. I've had trouble sleeping for years but these relax me and put me to sleep very naturally feeling without waking up groggy or tierd.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: UPDATE: someone told me this is a cool pack. It needs to be labeled. Product is in good condition, did not melt. Thank you for taking the steps to be sure the product would not be heat damaged. ||This bag of goo came with my order. I am unclear if it’s a product or ice pack maybe? There is no label of any kind telling me what this is. The product came in a pouch, not a bottle. YOU SHOULD LABEL THE COLD-PACKS for liability reasons. Someone could could eat it.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I will definitely try the strawberry ones next, this taste is horrible! Like a sour watered down grape Kool aid. Definitely take before you brush your teeth! However, they do work! My dreams are WAY more vivid tho. I can sleep longer solid bouts! I feel way more rested the next day.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Sirve según lo que el producto indica

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These are the only melatonin we keep in our house and I do think they help! If I pop one 30 mins before bed, it’s certainly been easier to settle into bed. They taste great too!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Okay, so yes, we see the title, we allllll see it. Don't get me wrong, this stuff works but I had to eat four instead of the recommended two for results. Now, I'm a college student, 5ft11 and 175lbs. I've never needed sleeping aides before but insomnia in college, especially in this day and age, is a given so I wanted to try something non-addictive.It has a pleasant, slightly minty taste. Fun to chew with the little quirky aftertaste I always expect from oral supplements. I tried two one day and didn't sleep much different. I did this a couple more times throughout the month just to see if the first time was a fluke and didn't see much difference. However, I tried four and slept like a baby!I'm not advocating over-usage so don't put that on me. But considering my body mass index, I might actually need four and be okay. If you've got less meat on your bones, definitely start out with two. Then try three or four if you're not satisfied or if you're a little larger.But be careful, and don't let the bed bugs bite
ReviewTitle: Works but not strong enough for me

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I got these as they are supposed to help with anxiety and help you sleep. I think they work ok but they are pricey compared to other brands. eating the dose puts me to sleep in an hour and I do perceive myself having some relief from anxiety. That being said if all you want is sleep then I would suggest other similary products that are cheaper and faster acting. If you want the anxiety help and sleep help then these may fit your need, but again I am not fully convinced they are worth what I paid for them. As for taste they are good enough as I am not eating these for pleasure. they wont make you gag so thats all I ask for.
ReviewTitle: It works but a little pricey

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: lately I have been struggling to STAY asleep through the night waking up several times to where it feels like I did not sleep at all. When I pop 2 of these gummies (a serving size) I am OUT within 30 minutes and stay asleep through the night. When you take the gummies about 15 minutes in, you get an all around full body calmness that you can feel and it is heavenly and you feel so calm until you drift away to sleep peacefully. I love these.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I've been using these for about a week after suffering from constant insomnia issues.Since day 1 of trying them they have worked wonders, I really did get markedly drowzy about 30 minutes after chewing them, but not like messed up drowzy/dizzy like when taking Lunesta, just a natural feeling ready-for-sleep. If you need to feel almost drunk to fall asleep, this might not be your best bet, but it is better than waking up with crazy halitosis from the stronger things on the market. It also just feels more healthy than sleep crashing.The one thing I dislike is the flavor, it's just a bit weird chewing a sweet berry mint gummy, but I understand with what is in the gummies they tried their best to mask the medicine taste. Also, the OCD side of me is bothered by the fact that it doesn't contain 60 gummies so you'd have a whole month's worth, because chewing 2 a night means only having 25 days worth in a bottle. That's probably just me, though.I would say the price is cheap enough that it is worth a shot if you're having trouble deciding on a method to get to sleep more reliably.
ReviewTitle: Works reliably right away, just wish it tasted super delicious

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: When I have had a few nights of poor sleep I chew one of these 30 minutes before bed and they do seem to relax me and make me tired.  My dreams are always weird so no effect there.  I do not use these on a regular  basis as I feel that is not an appropriate thing to do with melatonin.  But for occasional use I find them a solid choice when I need to sleep.
ReviewTitle: I take half the dose and it works for me.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I was looking for more effective melatonin gummies, and was influenced by countless Olly commercials to give these a swing.Bottle is cute and easy to open, but the taste.. I knew it was blackberry and mint, but the mint overpowers the blackberry, and leaves behind a nasty, herbal aftertaste. It's a bad combination of flavours, and I wish they chose something that would better compliment the mint.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Edit :Its now 1 week later, and I am still not entirely sure it helped my sleep. It did seem to help me to fall asleep easier. Placebo affect ? I have had no overly tired nights, though I have had some rather interesting dreams. I have recalled more dreams in the last week than I have in the last 3 or 4 years. I am going to continue using it.Original :So I ordered this after reading a few stories online.I travel for work and often have trouble falling asleep. I have been taking 2 when ready for bed. Right now I am giving it a go at home. I didn't want to be overly drowsy etc while traveling. Seems to really help me. I have not woke up overly groggy in the past 3 days of trials.Tomorrow is my 1st night in a new hotel and I am anxious to see if it helps me fall asleep as easily. I'll update in a day or two.
ReviewTitle: Seems to indeed promote easing off to sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Bottle about 1/5 full - no way there’s 70 in there. I haven’t opened it to count but peering between the cap & the top of the label I can see there’s only about an inch of gummies in the bottle. Don’t want to open to count but I’m going to look in Target next time I’m there to see if it’s the same.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Olly is always a great brand to use. You can trust that their product works. This works wonderfully when I need to get solid sleep without waking up. Best to take one or two one hour before when you want to fall asleep.  Unlike some other sleeping aids, you do not wake up the next day with a 'hangover' or headache. The gummies are also a great flavour.You get what you pay for in this product... even though I wish it was a little cheaper.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This is my personal experience with them - taste is fine and after about 20ish minutes you will most definitely need to sleep. However staying asleep was an issue for me. I have to get up at 5am so I gave myself a child's bedtime of 9:00 but most nights my brain won't shut up and let me sleep. Tried these and sleep came quickly. It was a deep sleep while it lasted but it seemed to wear off around 3 and left me with a drowsy feeling. Not a bad product at all, and you will have no choice but to sleep after taking them, but you may not end up staying asleep the whole night (again, that could just be me).
ReviewTitle: Works pretty well and will get you to sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Good price but a little light on the theanine for my needs. I am a heavy guy and if you are more average-sized this formula may work great for you! Great tasting.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Si me han funcionado para volver a mi vieja hora de dormir, regular el sueño, no es que me den sueño pero me ayudan a relajarme. Algo importante es que al tomarlas debes estar dispuesto a dormir y libre de distracción. El sabor está bien

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: They definitely make me sleeping within 30 minutes. But I wish I slept all through the night I always seem to wake up

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: They are helpful.  I take two every night.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The product is fine but PLEASESTOP delivering this packed on ice!! It does not need to be and clearly states to be stored in a cool dry place!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I fkn LOVE sleep, and it eluded me for some time. I hear about melatonin, and how it gives people nightmares, so I’ve always avoided it. Unfortunately, life without sleep became a living nightmare, so I ordered the product. Holy crap on a cracker, this stuff works! Exactly as specified, I started feeling sleepy in about half an hour (honestly, I don’t even remember the instructions...maybe that’s what it said), and SLEPT THROUGH THE WHOLE GD NIGHT!!!!I became a different person. If you’re on the fence, buy it!One downside. The flavor. The color and smell of these gummies tricked my brain into thinking this was going to be grape every. single. time.This flavor is not a fun surprise even once, let alone every day.Manufacturer: Could we pretty please just make the flavor grape??
ReviewTitle: The flavor is an unpleasant surprise, but this stuff works!!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Made me dizzy  in 20 minutes

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Listen, overall- great night's sleep! I'm 140 lbs and take 2 of these bad boys. Within about 30 minutes, my eyelids will be drooping, I'll kiss the day goodnight and descend into madness. Been taking these about a week, and I've dreamt of being Sailor Moon, Acid Guns, Running from the cops, Trading holographic goat stickers to work at a deathmetal gas station, a samuari with Obama's voice threatening me with secrets of national security, and one time I boinked my sister. All with a gloomy grey-tone to all these dreams. But hey, this indicates lots of REM-Cycle a-happenin', and dreams are just rando corpus callosum electric firings (I recommend watching "The Mind: Explained" on Netflix for all sorts of that neat info). Course, not everyone will react the same, and truthfully, doesn't really bother me- I like wackadoo dreams. But, ye been warned.
ReviewTitle: Want a great nights sleep and freaky acid dreams? This is the gummy for you!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Within 20 minutes I’m fighting to keep my eyes open. I’ve also noticed nightmares have decreased, not sure if there is a correlation but seems to have made a difference! It has been a little harder getting up in the morning, but worth the good rest.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: They do help me get back to sleep but only when I take four, twice the suggested dose.
ReviewTitle: Do help me get back to sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Not crazy about the taste but they definitely get the job done. My item was packed with I guess an ice pack that was leaking when I opened it. The bag was so soaked that the labels came off and the bag was discolored. But the product inside was fine. I appreciate that they tried to keep the gummies from melting in the heat!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These gummies make me fall asleep within 15 minutes of taking them. However then I seem to wake up multiple times throughout the night, usually 3-4 hours after falling asleep. I have extremely vivid dreams when using these- sometimes nightmares- but nothing so disturbing that I have stopped using them. I also tend to wake up for the day earlIer with these. It’s unusual because I feel well rested when waking up even though it’s earlier than I would usually awake, and my sleep had been off and on throughout the night. When using these I feel more able to wake up in the morning and am in a better mood. Maybe it’s because I get more REM sleep when using these. Whatever it is, it makes mornings more pleasant. I will buy again.
ReviewTitle: Easier to wake up in morning

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I bought these supplements because I work early in the morning and therefore have to go to bed early.  On weekends, my sleep schedule resets itself and on Sunday night, I have trouble falling asleep as early as I need to in order to function on Monday morning.  One gummy does help to make me sleepy but there is another weird effect: I wake up exactly an hour after I fall asleep.  I'm usually awake for around five minutes and then I drift off again.  Some nights, I'll wake up several times, for a few minutes each time, which is weird for me because I don't usually wake up during the night.  I definitely feel like I'm getting more sleep than if I don't have a gummy before bed, but the random waking up during the night is odd.
ReviewTitle: Makes me sleepy at bedtime but also makes me wake up during the night

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These do in fact work, however, I found myself napping a lot more during the day. After taking these I would naturally wake up after 5-6 hours of sleep. I wouldn't say that these improve the quality of my sleep, but they do make you drowsy after 30-40 minutes. However, after an hour or two of waking up in the morning, I would find myself extremely tired, making me nap during the day, leading me to have a hard time sleeping at night. In that case, I would have to take the gummies again. It kinda becomes a cycle, but they are non-habit forming so I guess theres really no harm. However, its probably best to use these when you really need them.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I am a horrible insomniac and have been on every medication on the market and most do not woek or make me feel so hung over it’s not worth taking them, until I found this combination of melatonin, lemon balm, chamomile that is in ollo’s sleep gummies. This works really well to help me sleep without making me feel hung over the next morning. I normally take Hello Bello Sleep Well gummies, but I couldn’t find them anywhere so I purchased ollo brand with most of the same ingredients. They too work well to help with sleep. While they work well I won’t be purchasing them again as I didn’t care for the flavor.
ReviewTitle: Effective for insomnia but the flavor has much to be desired.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: For years I was taking sleeping medication and every year I was increasing my dosage. Nothing would work, not teas, herbal remedies, plain melatonin etc. I got tired of paying so much for my medications and went off. I was most worried about my sleep. I tried Olly on a whim, it was cheap and it had decent reviews. I am on my second bottle and honestly, I get better sleep than I did with my medication. I don’t wake up groggy and it typically kicks in within an hour. Others have complained of stomach pains—I have experienced stomach aches once—they’re most likely not related, think about what you eat, drink and do before bed. For those who have tried everything and nothing worked, this might actually help!
ReviewTitle: First natural sleep aid that works!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Just like the regular melatonin tablets, it can make you groggy the next day or if you take it too early.. you might wake up in the middle of the night with a difficult time going back to sleep. Once you find your own rhythm with it, it works. Usually best to take an hour or two after you’ve eaten.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I don’t think these are really for me. It feels like we sometimes work and sometimes don’t but I would recommend to at least try them they might work for you.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: es un buen producto para conciliar el sueño

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I am 61y/o female and weight 128 lbs.  I've had trouble staying asleep for several years.  After 2-3 hours I was wide awake, sometimes for the rest of the night.  I received these yesterday and chewed 2 as directed before bed.  After about 1/2 hour I started to get sleepy.  Went to bed at 10 and woke up sometime around 4? but still sleepy and fell back to sleep almost immediately.  It's 10am now and I just got up at 9:30!  I kept waking up this morning but was so sleepy I kept falling back to sleep.  A bit groggy this morning but probably from so much sleep. I do not take pills except the occasional ibuprofen.  I have to say it's effective but will try only one gummy next time.
ReviewTitle: Too effective for me.  Read review.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Long story short these put me to sleep fast but I end up still waking up in increments. If 'll sleep than wake up around 3 am and can't fall back to sleep. Not sure if this is a coincidence as well but I’ve been having some hardcore nightmares. Also the taste isn’t terrible but the gummies texture is hard or like they’re stale….

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I got a better result using only one gummie.  Read online that sometimes melatonin in higher dosage can actually have an adverse effect on sleep.  Definitely falling asleep faster. I have sleep maintenance insomnia which means that I can't maintain sleep,  and cycle through sleep wake rapidly, so I never sleep more than 40 minutes at a time. I wake up, then it'll be about another hour before I fall asleep again.  I do think this product has extended those cycles. I seem to be maintaining about two hours now, which is great, considering!  No grogginess in the morning, and I feel more alert with better sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I am so disappointed that both times I ordered the pouch they came in one big melted together mess. The first time I was able to refrigerate them and pull them apart in some semblance of what would be a gummy size but the second time it was just a big blob and there was no way to figure out what would be a gummy size which made it hard to cut it up so I could use them. I was really sad about this because these gummies are the only thing on the market that truly help me fall asleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These gummies truly help me feel sleepy and more importantly find a restful sleep around a half hour to hour after taking a serving (2 gummies).P.S. - Would be 5 star rating, however for some reason (probably something to do with me and my body chemistry) I wake up from a restful sleep approx. 6 hours later after taking these. This has happened 12/12 nights of taking these supplements. Once awake, I am wide awake and unable to fall back asleep. The 6 hours may sound like a good amount of sleep, however I really would love to take these to help fall asleep and then wake up whenever my body naturally feels like it Whether that’s 5 hours of sleep up to my max of 8 hours.
ReviewTitle: 100% of the time I fall asleep within the hour of taking these. Works for me!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Despite amazon’s best efforts, an ice pack thrown in the package, I keep getting progressively more and more melted gummies. Last time they were manageable but this time I’m trying to see if putting them in the fridge will make it better. I can’t really use a melted pile of goo to help me sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: So, as someone who had written off melatonin, I have to say that these do work. I also can take just one of them instead of the recommended dose of 2 gummies and fall asleep just fine. However, once I am asleep it does cause me to have weird dreams sometimes or to sleep too long and not hear my alarm in the morning. There is a little bit of a groggy effect in the morning if I take these, but I have anxiety and it can take me hours to fall asleep sometimes if my mind is racing. If I take one of these, at least I get a full night sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have had trouble sleeping for as long as I can remember. I have tried other OTC before to varying degrees of success. Someone at work recommended I tried to Olly Sleep and I must say it works pretty well for what it is.The berry mint is sweet and fresh with only a mild after taste.I keep them by my bed and take about 30 minutes before I want to sleep.I still wake up at night but find falling back to sleep easier and quicker. It wears off a few hours before I normally wake up so I don't feel drowsy the next morning.Overall a good gummy vitamin to help you sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I’ve tried a lot of melatonin supplements, and only very few work for me. I’ve noticed with this one it puts me to sleep and I actually stay a sleep all night. Other brands, I’d wake up 3/4 times in the night and still be tired. But these don’t do that! Worth a try. But be warned, they taste awful!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This would be five stars of it were lower in melatonin. It gets me to sleep but melatonin, in high, doses is habit forming for me. Great flavor. I love lemon balm and camomile and the herbs affect on me and my nights sleep which is why I got interested in this product. I seen it at a local 7-11. I took half a dose when I needed to and ordered from Amazon after I read out. Also, L-theanine is a favorite supplement of mine and is found in green Tea. If melatonin levels were no more than 1mg per serving I would recommend it to more people.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have purchased this product many times, and it has really helped with my sleep quality.  This was my first time to order it on Amazon, and unfortunately the bottle contents came melted.  Amazon shipped me out another bottle, but it was also melted.  I appreciate their effort, but will not be ordering it again from this seller.
ReviewTitle: Great product, but will not order again -defective twice

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: First I want to say THANK YOU!! for the wonderful TEN star packaging & shippng!! A couple of little ice packs were included in the insulated bag. What a great consideration with all this heat to avoid a melted mess! I really appreciated it :)Now, the item: it took a couple of days, maybe to build up? Who knows, but I DON't sleep, ugh. This product IS a lifesaver & when used consistently, in addition to a regular bed time, I'm seeing very positive results. I'm actually sleeping very soundly for several hours & I am pleased to be using a natural product with NO groggy side effects the next morning.
ReviewTitle: You'll get results with consistent use

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: It doesn’t do much but you’ve been feeling better in the morning when I get up tbh

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: What can I say? It really works! I’ve tried melatonin pills and other natural ways but Olly sleep works the best!! It takes about 20-30 min until you start feeling drowsy.However, there is a downside to it. I started feeling extra drowsy when I wake up after prolonged use. I would also feel extremely agitated in the morning if my sleep was cut short (because I’m waking up in the middle of deep rem sleep). These are effects I stated noticing after prolonged daily use.I only take 1 gummy now only when I really need help falling asleep. They really work but may have some side effects.
ReviewTitle: I’ve been using for half a year but....

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Works great!! I’m a little sensitive to melatonin so instead of taking the dose amount which is 2 gummies, I just take 1 to get relaxed enough to sleep. They put you in the best sleep possible!!! I only need the 1 gummy which is equal to 1.5mg but I guess if I wanted a deeper sleep I could take the 3mg. The one and only thing that was a little off putting was the flavor.. not super great. There’s a little after taste to them but it’s definitely not a deal breaker. I love Olly vitamins and we have the men’s and women’s ones as well. So good!!!! I might get the other ones to supplement too.
ReviewTitle: Works fast & Not a groggy sleep!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

The packaging says 30, but for me it works way better taken earlier in advance.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I bought this for my family. They all have difficulty falling asleep. With these gummies it takes 15 minutes or so and they are out. The taste isn't bad but its not the best thing ever.  I never subscribe to stuff but I did for this one!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Wasn’t sure at first if I was getting better rest using these gummies, but after using them a few nights a week, it seemed like I was staying asleep longer and getting better rest.  I will say that my dreams do seems far more vivid which can be interesting or not so interesting depending on what your brain is processing, but I’m going to continue to use them occasionally.  My doctor advised NOT to use them daily as studies have shown dependence will happen with chronic use of sleep aids as well as possible early dementia.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I like the product, it has worked great for us, however beware of shipping in hot weather. The gummies are supposed to stay cool. The package arrived with two cooling packs inside of it, which were boiling hot. I didn't open the gummies package but could feel that it had turned into liquid. Do not order these for shipping if it is hot at all out, they will melt in the shipping van. It was easy to return them though.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Wow these knock me the heck out. I've had issues sleeping for years. I usually take melatonin, but still toss and turn and wake several times a night. These have an extra something to them. I take them and get in bed and I fall in to a deep sleep that lasts all night long. A semi truck could drive through my room and it wouldn't wake me. I wake up well rested and not groggy at all. I would have given full 5 stars, except the 25 day supply is annoying. Why not a full 30? Can't use subscribe and save because I will fall short.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Used for the first time. I took two gummies as instructed in the directions. It did make me drowsy a similar affect that medicine gives you. So it put me to sleep but it did not keep me asleep. That’s the problem I’m having is restless nights, constantly tossing and turning, and this gummies did not seem to help that at all. I woke up still feeling groggy and super hungry for some reason.But on a side note, I did wake up feeling in a really good mood! I don’t know why , maybe the melatonin in it?

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I'm really happy with the quality. In the past, I purchased the "goodbye stress" gummies of this brand which worked surprisingly well so I decided to give the Melatonin gummies a go. For me, the dosis is much too high so I've been taking half a Gummy which is more than enough in my opinion. Even after taking it several nights in a row I never experienced any adverse effects such as nightmares or a headache which regularly happened to me with some other brands. The only adverse effect that I sometimes feel is that I'm a little groggy. So far, this is the best Melatonin I've come across in the US.I would give it 5 stars if there was a sugar free version with a lower dosis of Melatonin (it's really bad to take it after brushing your teeth/it messes with your blood sugar).
ReviewTitle: Finally a Melatonin that works and doesn't give me nightmares!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Excited by the great reviews, I decided to try this. I have not been able to sleep for years.  These taste great, are very affordable, and get delivered quickly.  At first I slept better than I had been but it is hit and miss now. I will take that. It gets me to sleep but nothing keeps me asleep.  It is worth it for the price. Some sleep is better than no sleep! Thanks Olly! Thanks Amazon!
ReviewTitle: Works some of the time and I will take that.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: UPDATE: someone told me this is a cool pack. It needs to be labeled. Product is in good condition, did not melt. Thank you for taking the steps to be sure the product would not be heat damaged. ||This bag of goo came with my order. I am unclear if it’s a product or ice pack maybe? There is no label of any kind telling me what this is. The product came in a pouch, not a bottle. YOU SHOULD LABEL THE COLD-PACKS for liability reasons. Someone could could eat it.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Okay, so yes, we see the title, we allllll see it. Don't get me wrong, this stuff works but I had to eat four instead of the recommended two for results. Now, I'm a college student, 5ft11 and 175lbs. I've never needed sleeping aides before but insomnia in college, especially in this day and age, is a given so I wanted to try something non-addictive.It has a pleasant, slightly minty taste. Fun to chew with the little quirky aftertaste I always expect from oral supplements. I tried two one day and didn't sleep much different. I did this a couple more times throughout the month just to see if the first time was a fluke and didn't see much difference. However, I tried four and slept like a baby!I'm not advocating over-usage so don't put that on me. But considering my body mass index, I might actually need four and be okay. If you've got less meat on your bones, definitely start out with two. Then try three or four if you're not satisfied or if you're a little larger.But be careful, and don't let the bed bugs bite
ReviewTitle: Works but not strong enough for me

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I love the Olly gummies. You should totally buy them if you are looking for a restful night of sleep, however, if you live in a warm climate hold off until it gets cold out to order these. The package came with a “cold pack” that didn’t do anything and now I have one giant melatonin gummy. I put it in the freezer so I can break off pieces/take bites of it easier. If you need an exact dose of melatonin I do NOT recommend this. The product does what it’s supposed to though, so hopefully yours won’t come melted together.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Most nights I only need one chewy. But dosage for 3 mg is two. So my bottle lasts twice as long. Sometimes less is better, its a *itch to lower dosage. So start low. In the past I worked myself up to 10mg. Thats the recommended highest dosage.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have been having trouble sleeping for the last few months and have recently started experimenting with melatonin. I find that it makes me tired, but my mind doesn't turn off, so I still don't fall asleep easily. I decided to try Olly Sleep to see if the extra ingredients would help with that aspect.I took only one gummy (instead of the serving size of two) and was amazed by how quickly my racing mind turned off. I fell asleep, hard... so much so that I turned off my alarm in my sleep and slept in TWO hours! Needless to say, I think one gummy may be too much for me (at 130 lbs, if that helps anyone). I think I will need to go down to 1/2 a gummy next time!
ReviewTitle: Amazing, but I turned off my alarm in my sleep!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

Exactly as specified, I started feeling sleepy in about half an hour (honestly, I don’t even remember the instructions...maybe that’s what it said), and SLEPT THROUGH THE WHOLE GD NIGHT!!!!I became a different person. The color and smell of these gummies tricked my brain into thinking this was going to be grape every. single. time.This flavor is not a fun surprise even once, let alone every day.Manufacturer: Could we pretty please just make the flavor grape??

ReviewTitle: Great product, but poor quality on latest shipment!!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Edit 12/5/20: I am almost done with these and I have to update my review to 3 stars. Is it possible to build a tolerance to these gummies within 2 months? Not sure. I fall asleep quickly but I no longer stay asleep all night. I wake up around 3am or 4am - wide awake and again my thoughts start running and it's hard to fall back asleep. Unfortunately, I don't think these work for long term or at least, don't work for everyday use so I won't be repurchasing. Not worth the extra calories!Original Review:I'm not a true insomniac, I just have a really hard time falling asleep quickly and staying asleep. It sometimes takes me an hour or two of tossing and turning before I finally fall asleep usually because I'm dwelling on something that I just can't stop thinking about despite listening to relaxing podcasts, doing yoga, etc. Then, in the middle of the night, my eyes will pop open for no reason and my thoughts start running again.I have taken other melatonin brands with mixed success. They tend to work but I usually feel groggy and gross in the morning.I've taken these gummies for 4 evenings straight and feel like they're working for me. I follow the instructions and have implemented a strict bedtime routine to try and reap the most benefits. I have a strict no-screen policy starting around 8:30pm take the gummies around 9pm. After brushing my teeth and my skincare routine, I'll hop into bed to do some reading until I start feeling sleepy. I find it takes about 30 minutes of reading before I start to feel the effects. Once I put the book away, I don't seem to be struggling to fall asleep and I'm also not jarred awake by my own thoughts in the middle of the night, which is such a relief!I actually really enjoy the taste and the gummies are just so much more enjoyable than chalky pills. It's hard to say if these are truly medically effective and not just a placebo effect - I hear so much about the fraudulent claims of vitamin companies. But, given the great results so far, why mess with a good thing? I just hope I won't always have to rely on these and the habits of my body will eventually take over for a good night's rest.
ReviewTitle: Started strong, not so much now

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I literally threw them away this sleeping gummies made me feel like my body numb it was a weird feeling never again

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: As in the title of the review, I ate two, waited an hour but never fell a sleep… took 3 more, it took a while to drift off but in the morning, I felt great.  Not the typical, grogginess wishing I could sleep longer sort of morning.  I hope I don’t need 5-6 of these every night but if so then at least I know the mornings will be pleasant. As reference, I am a 60yo male, very active, most nights it is my active brain that keeps me awake.  I use brown noise in the background and sleep next to the love of my life.  I am employed, earn well, good job and no health issues… just a very active mind. I hope this helps you choose.
ReviewTitle: Did not get me to sleep faster but felt good

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Everyone reacts differently to drugs so I am offering my experience. I bought these gummies because I was seeking a sleep aid that didn't lead to grogginess afterwards - a feature touted by some reviewers.Pros: You definitely will fall asleep soon after taking the drug which I found impressive as I am now resistant to Benadryl at high doses.Con: I experienced intense grogginess the next day with the recommended dose of 2 gummies. It was quite a miserable experience. I now take 1/2 of a gummy which still leads to some grogginess but allows me function the next day. I'm going to continue de-escalating the dose with the hopes that I'll find a dose that's still effective but minimizes grogginess.
ReviewTitle: Definitely works but experienced intense grogginess afterwards

I did get sleepy but not sure if that was my really the gummies or my body.  4 hrs later I was awake. Maybe I took them too early, I thought to myself. Waited until 9pm the next night. Awake at 2am. 3rd night I took 3 gummies. I NEED SOME SLEEP!!! 4th, 5th and now the 6th night is a repeat show I can't stop. Needless to say, I either need a therapist, a doctor or stronger sleeping pills.  These gummies are no match for my body. Research will be done this weekend.  Good luck to you if you are considering buying them. Genuine good luck.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My 3-star rating is more based on cost per dose, the "film" that appears in the bottom of the bottles, lack of expiration date on one of the two 50 count bottles, and the fact that they are not as fresh and a little chewier than those purchased locally.  My first experience with this product was with a 100 count bottle purchased locally.  I very much like the product and it works well for me - good taste and I fall asleep quicker.  So, looking to save a little on price, I came to Amazon where I misread the quantity and ordered two 50 count bottles rather than the two 100 ct bottles I thought I was getting.  They were shipped as promised and were well packaged with gel cooling packs in a foam padded box (made me wonder where they came from).  I just opened the first new bottle last night and noticed a sticky film on the bottom of the bottle where the gummies had been sitting.  Note, in the time I've used the 100 count, this has never appeared.  So, I checked for an expiration date and lot code.  There is none on this bottle, but the unopened bottle has both as does the 100 count bottle.  I also noted that the unopened 50 count which has the lot code and exp. date also has the film at the bottom of the bottle.  Based on all of this, I am unlikely to order this product online in the future - I can get it locally at less expense and I can see before I buy that it is properly marked, as well as experience tells me the product will be fresher.
ReviewTitle: I very much like the product and it works well for me - ...

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: When it comes to any review, I have found that it can depend on expectations. I have tried all of the ingredients in these gummies in other formulations, so I believe my expectations were realistic. I didn't notice any change from a physical viewpoint, and my sleep monitors didn't indicate any differences that were significant either. Of course my baseline was not that of never having tried these ingredients, and in fact I was getting them in other forms right up until I started these.I believe that the idea behind these reviews is to help people decide whether or not to purchase a product, so I would conclude that this product delivers the ingredients in a manner that is helpful, but I didn't find it to be superior to other, less expensive, products. If you like the delivery system, then I think that it's worth trying, otherwise don't expect it to be better.
ReviewTitle: I guess it depends on your expectations
Reviewer: Voracious consumer and purchaser of things I don't really need

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This rating is based on my Amazon purchase, not the product or brand itself.I have purchased this exact product off of a store shelf multiple times, and it was perfectly effective and easy to consume. Soft gummies, quick to chew, etc. If I bought this from a store shelf it would be 5 stars, hands down.I tried ordering it from Amazon this once. I got the exact same package, but the gummies were darker, smaller, harder, and drier. Much more difficult to chew up. However, they were still perfectly effective and I plan to use them all up just the same. If I had to guess, the product spent some time on a very hot warehouse shelf somewhere and was likely subjected to conditions outside of the recommended storage specs.All Olly products that I have purchased in a physical store have been perfectly effective and easy to chew. If the ease of eating these is the primary reason you are going with Olly, then by all means buy them from your local retail establishment - but beware if you order them online, as you don't know what conditions they have been in. The ones I got still work to put me to sleep as advertised, but they are much harder to chew, which might be important for people with certain dental conditions. The flavor has also been adversely affected.
ReviewTitle: Awesome product . . . from a retail store shelf.
