ReviewTitle: Do not take if you have might have sleep apnea

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I don't know which of the ingredients "didn't agree with me," as my grandmother used to say. It definitely made me very sleepy (took only one) and quickly. Unfortunately, I also felt out of breath and I got a bad headache and felt nauseous.Besides melatonin, the gummies contain L-Theanine, chamomile extract, passionflower extract, lemon balm extract, and then other ingredients for the gummy part I guess, such as glucose, beet sugar, gelatin, coloring from carrot and blueberrie juices, pectin, coconut oil and carnauba wax (hmmm, they used to put that in car wax back in the day).So, it could be my body had a reaction to one or more of these ingredients .  I'm not aware of any allergies to any of the ingredients, so I don't know.  I gave the product a rating of 4 stars only because of that. The company itself provides great customer service. I got a reply to my email very quickly and I got a full refund for the bottle of 110 gummies. That says a lot about their integrity.
ReviewTitle: I had a reaction to the gummies but customer support was great

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Update - I just got a new updated version of melatonin and I do not like the taste of the new batch. I'm hoping they still work as well,  but the original version tasted good and worked well. I don't know why they changed the taste,  but I hope they go back.I have arthritis in my hip and the pain makes it difficult to sleep. The melatonin helps me stay asleep in comfort better  until I need to move.I like the gentle sleep aid that doesn't leave me feeling groggy at whatever point I wake up.
ReviewTitle: Update - Melatonin help sleep through pain

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Zarbee taste better
ReviewTitle: Work but taste isn’t the best

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I like the product and have ordered it twice but will not order again because of the packaging that is used in the mailing. Both times the packing material has leaked all over the contents. Very poor choice for the mailing!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Beware when myself and my husband took these we were more tired the next day after a full nights rest. Almost felt hungover in a haze. Idk what else is possibly in these due to lack of the FDA structure.. but boy not taking them again! Not that is Ollys fault by any means. But unsure of the blend and it wasn’t compatible for us.Husband is working night shift and needs something to help ease his mind and allow rest with two babies in the house during the day. But this is not it!BEWAREThe packaging is “child proof” also adult proof. It’s very difficult to open. I imagine no individual with carpal tunnel nor arthritis would be able to open this bag without cutting it.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My shipment arrived, gel pack inside the packaging was damaged/leaking. Gummies were melted into a solid glob!  Tried to process a return/exchange and was advised this product is not eligible for returns.  Any suggestions?

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I hate giving Olly 3 stars because it's not their fault...it's the company who shipped its fault. First shipment came with a freeze pack that wasn't cold at all, therefore, the gummies melted into one big blob. Amazon sent me a replacement which I received today. It too was melted into one big blob. I highly recommend buying at your local grocery store.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: N/A
ReviewTitle: Its ok but did not make me sleepy need some thing more strong

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I saw a Nyquil ZZZ commercial and when I looked for it on Amazon, this stuff popped up. Read the reviews and got this instead. The texture and taste of these is mediocre. Not enjoyable but doable. For me, they worked. A little too well because I felt  groggy and odd the next day. I had stomach problems and blunted perception that made me feel weird, too. Maybe it'll work better for other people but I didn't like the side affects of this at all. L-Theanine can lower your blood pressure and feelings of excitement. This did work to put me to sleep but it made me feel super drowsy the next day.
ReviewTitle: Maybe they will work for you

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have had very strong insomnia all my life ever since I was a child, and I've always  had to rely on sleeping pills one way or another on order to help me sleep.  Melatonin has been helpful in helping me sleep, so I was expecting these gummies to do the trick. Although I will say that I've realized that with melatonin I've been noticing my body becoming "wise" to it, and I've been lately having to increase the dosage. These gummies they worked fine on my husband, and he went to sleep rather quickly, but they sadly didn't do anything for me. Instead of taking the recommended 2 gummies, I took 4 to see if maybe that would work; and even with 4 gummies it didn't help me. I just have very strong insomnia, so I can't say in this review  that the gummies don't work, only that they didn't work on my particular type of insomnia.I guess it's time to go find another sleep solution. Ugh
ReviewTitle: Not the best sleeping gummies for me

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have occasional bouts of insomnia and have had some success with melatonin in the past, so when I ran out of my last bottle of melatonin, I decided to try the Olly sleep. I’m a huge fan of the Olly products- I use their vitamins and probiotics daily, and I really enjoy their protein powders, so it was a no-brainer to give these a go. I’ll be honest- I had unrealistically high hopes. I have never tried an Olly product I didn’t like.Turns out, I met my match in these gummies. I took the melatonin and the taste was awful. There was a very “herbal” taste to them- I’m not 100% sure, but I think it’s the chamomile. It gave me the absolute worst indigestion. I thought maybe it was a fluke so I tried them a second night...nope, same raging indigestion.After a handful of Tums, I did manage to get some sleep. So they do what they say, but they just weren’t the product for me.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Product states store in a “cool area”.  Shipment was sent with an ice pack in it. Internal temperature on arrival was 96 degrees, within a minute from leaving the truck. Is this product safe to consume

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Yes, these gummies work to help you sleep but I've had some good gummies these are like chewing saran wrap. Flavor is ok they need to work on making them more gummie. Not really my favorite. I cut these in half otherwise I wake up with a headache. On to something else!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I typically use the dream sleep melatonin gummies from Pacifica which work fantastic, they have me feeling sleepy pretty quickly and I feel like I also get better sleep using them as well. Most of the time I only have to take one of them instead of the suggested serving size of two, so they’re great. Amazon didn’t have them unfortunately and since these have more doses for around the same price I figured it was a good deal. Here’s my issues:1. The bottle says to only use these once in a while which I don’t really understand2. The flavor on the photo only says blackberry, but it’s berry and mint, which I think is pretty gross personally3. I take two and am still wide awake hours later so it’s safe to say they don’t work all that wellMay just be me but since the Pacifica ones work just fine, I don’t know.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I took this one time and all night my heart was beating so heard I did not take it again. I gave it away. I was too nervous

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The taste is a bit off, the Walmart brand works so much better this didn’t really work for me

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I love the taste, they help get to sleep but they give me a headache. You may need to monitor the dose to see what you can tolerate, if you are also headache prone.
ReviewTitle: Finally figured out these are giving me a headache!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Everyone is telling me to try melatonin to help me sleep, so I did.  I'm familiar with this brand and liked that it was a gummy.  I don't have any issues with the brand at all.  My issue is with the melatonin.  I have very vivid and weird dreams.  After a few days of this, I decided this just isn't for me.  It had the same effect on my adult daughter as well.  I have known people who have zero issues with melatonin.  However, this supplement isn't for us.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Although these do not work for me if I just take two, taking three or four of the gummies does provide several hours of sleep.  Nice to know they are an option even if taking more than recommended dose when I really need to sleep.
ReviewTitle: These are effective at 1.5 times recommended dose

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I've never used melatonin before. I've used valerian root a lot in the past and now like to use lemon balm. I tried these because I wanted a gummy. (they're delicious!) They work very well, I slept all night, but they left me groggy in the morning. I tried them again and same thing. I guess it's the melatonin. I am never groggy with valerian or lemon balm so I guess I'll stick with them.
ReviewTitle: They work but leave me drowsy

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These definitely taste good and I’d say they worked OK. My adult daughter took 1-2 at a time while I took 2-3. I slept fairly well and didn’t have any morning after, groggy feelings but I’m not sure they were particularly effective. We were using them to try to keep us on track while traveling in Scandinavia this winter. Between the time difference and the late sunrise & early sunset/short days, it was a bit of a challenge. This bag of gummies lasted most of our 2 week trip but, we chose a more economical single capsule, 5 mg option for our longer travels around the south pacific. They’re not as tasty but they’re a fraction of the price and I feel like one capsule is more effective than 3 gummies.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Does not work for me. If I take these at 10pm, I am guaranteed to be up again at 1 am. Not a coincidence: at home, on travel, large meal, small meal, coffee, no coffee… consistently shallow, short-lived sleep. There are better brands out there.
ReviewTitle: Great if you want to be awake again in three hours.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Great for sleep but please redesign how you open the bag. I understand a “child safety” type of opening but I have arthritis and it takes me way too long and causes pain and frustration opening this bag. I’ll be buying the containers from now on, but don’t want to waste these.
ReviewTitle: Excellent for sleep but hard to open.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I found that these were wholly ineffective, personally. My wife said she had a bit easier time falling asleep, but I don't know if the difference is measurable/significant.Since I assumed this was a marketing gimmick anyway, and it basically met my expectations, I gave it 3 stars.If you really are having a tough time falling asleep, that is a medical problem that will certainly NOT be fixed with this product.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Tried to wean off an ssri and was having some insomnia. I took it one day and fell asleep. The more days I took the gummies, the re I found found them to be less effective , until the anxiety burned right through. I also feel the mix of melatonin and other ingredients, sugar, left me depressed the next day, as well as tired.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The product itself is fine as it makes me sleepy and helps me fall asleep. The taste leaves a bit less to be desired, but the packaging, oh the packaging is a nightmare. I have fairly small hands but the container is a weird square shape which makes it impossible to grip. I spent half an hour trying to get this darn thing open and finally accessed the gummies by using a pair of scissors to stab open the side of the container. Which was actually pretty difficult. I was actually sweaty but the time I got a single gummy out of the container and was very very awake and annoyed. Ultimately the actual product worked and it made me fall asleep but I wouldn’t buy this product again in this packaging. Just not worth the hassle.
ReviewTitle: Product works but terrible container that’s difficult to open

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: So these are over advertised and under delivered. The reason I say that is because unless you take a hand full you can not feel the affects at all. The first night I took two and woke up 30 min later and could not go back to sleep. Seriously so angry the whole next day. So the following night had to take the shone and again woke up in the middle of the night. So the 3rd night I just took a handful and that was the only way I was able to sleep - still woke up 2 hours earlier than the alarm. So point being these did not worm for me.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: While they do work, the flavor is horrible, will not buy again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: It helps you fall asleep. But the flavor is gross.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These did not live up to the hype for me. They didn’t work at all. I’m thinking about trying to them again on a different day to see how they do. They also had a bit of a bitter taste. I will definitely not buy again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Did not like that it arrived hot as that can alter a supplements overall strength and chemical contents. Better off buying in a temperature controlled store.
ReviewTitle: No better than other brands. Arrived hot however.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These taste amazing (which is good because I have to take quite a few to feel any effects). The amount of melatonin is very low compared to other brands. I understand that it has different ingredients as well but I wish it had more melatonin as well
ReviewTitle: Taste great but not much melatonin per serving

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I've been under alot of stress recently so I was intrigued with a gummy that could assist with falling and staying asleep. Gave some to my mom and sister as well. My mom got a headache and couldn't sleep but my sister said she had the best sleep in months. As for me, it made me drowsy, definitely made me sleepier; nevertheless, I still found myself waking up around 3-4am with feeling lethargic in the early morning. Overall, it was ok and it helps you get sleepy. I guess it depends on the individual and their sleep pattern prior to taking it.Btw I really like gummies and the taste reminds me a dimeatapp-lite (a definite plus for me!)

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: the jel pack exploded inside.  what a mess

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This was recommended to me as a great product.  I ordered it a week ago and it arrived a day later than promised and was sitting in a UPS envelope in the hot sun on my porch with 2 melted cooling bags.  These are gummies you know.  Took one last night and too soon to tell if it works.  They taste and smell good.  Need improvement on delivery and a bit of sense to put the package in 97 degree heat with melted cooling packs.
ReviewTitle: Arrived a Day Late and Packaging was Warm

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Used these for about a week.The flavor wasn't great, but it's bearable. Definitely tastes like medicine in my opinion. It makes me super sleepy after about 45 minutes, which is great, but I get severe anxiety and nightmares throughout the night after using these.They make me do that thing where you start waking up once an hour feeling like you've missed your alarm. I also woke up a few times thinking there was someone standing over my bed but it was my brain still dreaming. My dreams were also vivid and unsettling.I will discontinue use. These don't work for me.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These work pretty well most of the time.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This product works - maybe too well. I started off taking 2 gummies as recommended, but it gave me horrific stomach cramps to where I was doubled over. I ended up lowering to 1 gummy because I love how they calm me and help me fall asleep. My stomach doesn’t hurt after getting used to them now, but there are a couple downsides. For one, I can NOT get up in the morning. I get so tired for the whole next day after taking these. Also, I sometimes wake up in the middle of the night wide awake on these. They’re just okay. Great to help you fall asleep, but the next-day drowsiness is too much for me to handle.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I eat two gummies around 10 pm and it takes about an hour plus to fall asleep. I usually wake up at 5 or 6 in the morning because it's not strong enough to keep me asleep for 8 hours. Overall, I get about 4 hours of sleep evrynight only because I keep waking up every one or two hours in the middle of the night.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: So, I've used this product before and am a repeat purchaser. This time I decided to buy it in the bag vs the plastic container. Huge mistake. It is so difficult to open and close it. Nothing like fighting with packaging before bed. The zipper is awful. Otherwise, the product is great!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Overall I like this product. I really appreciate that it is all natural and not chemically based or habit forming. It is easy to swallow, or if you have the gummies, easy to choose and fruit-flavored. I would say that each night is a little different in how well I sleep. Not consistent. But that could be me because I've always had sleep issues. I like the product and will continue to use it.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: When it comes to functionality, it doesnt really work. My kids get more benefit from it, but only after I've given them at least 2 or 3, which I stopped all together and tried something else. For adults I was taking double and it didnt really do anything. It only worked when I was already pretty tired and i still took at least 2 or 3 and then i got a nice peaceful sleep. So not worth it.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Didn’t notice a change in sleep habits but to be fair I only had one because it was so hard to get down. The flavor is awful. Like medicine that’s gone bad

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I’ve struggled with insomnia on and off for some time now. Only now, I’ve decided to start taking supplements to stop it. The very first time I tried these gummies, they were so sweet that they hurt the teeth on one side of my mouth. After that I only chewed them on the other side. They worked fairly well initially, maybe a few days or so. Then, they weren’t as effective for me anymore. They’d make me a little sleepy for about 5 minutes or so and if I didn’t fall asleep in that window, it felt like I had lost my chance to get some sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I feel like this is unpopular opinion, but these did not work for me AT ALL and I also thought they tasted awful. I tried them for a few nights and will be throwing the rest away unfortunately
ReviewTitle: Didn’t work and did not like the taste

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I love the product. I really do... but the reason for 3/5 stars is that all three of my bottles have come with 49 gummies. Which can be quite annoying when your dose is supposed to be 2 gummies. The product is amazing. Very low key sleep aid that isn't overwhelming and doesn't give me intense dreams as other sleep remedies have. But it is irritating when you get down to the last dose and realize you only have a half dose left. One bottle had 49 full gummies and one sliver of a 50th gummy (about the thickness of a fine). I love the product but I just wish they paid more attention to quality control..

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I can generally fall asleep fairly easily, but struggle to stay asleep and often wake up over and over all night. I had previously tried melatonin, which was OK at helping me fall asleep, but not stay asleep all night. These had mixed results - sometimes it seemed like it was helping at least a little, other times sleep was just a restless as when I didn't take them at all. I imagine different people have different reactions to the product, but for me (and my wife who also tried them), they didn't really help at all and I have no intention of purchasing them again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: my kids love these and we alternate dosages from no melatonin up to 3mg and 5mg. Maybe because its summer and covid nightware affecting shipping, but this last time it took nearly a moth to arrive and they were melted into a big, hot gooy block - even the ice packs were hot! I used tapioca flour to help roll it out and cut it. kids we're non-plussed about it but with their adhd brains they really need these.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The product works but the taste is less than stellar and it sticks to your teeth. I question whether or not eating gummies every night before bed is healthy. I guess if you can’t swallow pills it’s the only option. This product works but yuk! It’s just too gooey and sweet before bed
ReviewTitle: Not tasty and sticks to teeth

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Got fully refound.
ReviewTitle: Got a bottle of melted meds.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: As the title says they work but they are melted into basically a solid. They are extremely soft it’s a little strange because it’s barely spring so I don’t know why they would have melted. I was giving a refund and they do work so that’s a plus. I will say they put me to sleep very fast and almost aggressively but I woke up a few hours later.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Long story short I accidentally purchased a 70 and a 50 pack and was astonished at the fact that both packages were filled 1/2 of the way at most. I'm sure the counts are accurate, but I was able to combine both the 70 and 50 into a single container and have probably enough room to fit 50 more of the gummies into a single 70 pack bottle.The gummies taste great and they're a good dosage, but good lord there is an immense amount of plastic waste. It doesn't have to be like this. I'll be looking around for companies that are less wasteful for my melatonin supplements.
ReviewTitle: If you love how much "air space" is in a bag of chips, this is the melatonin supplement for you

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The media could not be loaded.                                                                                            I've purchased these gummies in-store from other locations, and the gummies themselves work wonders. Seeing as Amazon was running a deal for it, I decided to take advantage of the it. However, as seen in the video, the gummies melted beyond use. Additionally, the shipping for the product took a week even with Prime shipping.Overall, 2.5/5 shipping quality. 5/5 on the gummies.
ReviewTitle: Gummies are great, shipping experience may vary.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These did not live up to the hype for me. They didn’t work at all. I’m thinking about trying to them again on a different day to see how they do. They also had a bit of a bitter taste. I will definitely not buy again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Taste great and definitely think it helps me sleep. Needs to be shipped in a box. Was shipped in padded envelope with a cold pack. Cold pack was completely thawed.  Cap had broken and punctured the cold pack so gelatin all over bottle.
ReviewTitle: Love the product but shipping was awful!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I love these gummies! They really help me sleep at night, as someone who suffers from anxiety, panic attacks, and have massive insomnia.The dosage indicates to take 2, but I found that taking 1 is already more than enough to make me fall asleep in less than 30 minutes.Anyways, when I ordered these gummies, my bag came in with a malfunction. I ripped the top part off, but it seems that the elastic zip was already glued together and it doesn’t close properly.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These sleep gummies are helpful but do upset your stomach. I tried one first and it did nothing for me. I then tried two the next evening which helped but it upset my stomach as well as it made me feel very off the next day. Worth trying as everyone's bodies are different. They have a nice fruity flavor. Just like eating a fruit snack.
ReviewTitle: Useful for Sleep but Gives Upset Stomach

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I really wanted to try the gummies in their original form so it would’ve been better to get it off of the bag. However, these gummies knocked me out realll good. Since I couldn’t tell how many gummies I was taking I took a good chunk of what I had. Didn’t even take a big amount to start feeling the gummies kick in.
ReviewTitle: Good just wished it wasn’t melted

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Proctor drive today in a pond first impressions packaging is nice Sleek modern looking but when you open the bottle it really is only about 1/3 full. And recommends to take to every night and you either they got a good deal on extra large bottles for their product or they're trying to make it seem like you get more than you paid for. I will update this review when I try it over the next few days

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Product works well, helps me go and stay asleep.Only problem is the way they showed up all stick together in a clump.They come apart easy enough every night, and I haven't had any other issues.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I love this melatonin supplement, but the new packaging (bags instead of jars) is terrible.  I am a repeat buyer and the latest order, in the new packaging, is a complete melted blob.  I purchased 3 of the new Olly melatonin supplements and each is ruined.  I've attached a pic for comparison of the new packaging with my old package..

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I've been using these at least a month now and they taste good and smell amazing. I think they help me fall asleep better but not stay asleep. Maybe they would work better for other people. I'm not 100% satisfied with the quality of sleep for the price but definitely better than nothing I guess.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Liked the taste. Pretty effective in getting me to sleep. However, it doesn’t last long, after 3h I’m awake.Be aware that I received package from Amazon with gummies melted in 2 giant gummies Sent it back.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I like these. They seem to work well but I recently bought the 60 gummy option and missed the fact that it came in a pouch. My bad on that, but the pouch also doesn’t have an expiration date?

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Unsure how to rate this.. the product itself is great.  But when it came to me. Everything was melted into a flat block. So that stinks. But I do love this product. Shipping didnt work out.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Just received my product and most of my gummies are melted ! It's like one big gummy.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: If you live somewhere hot, don’t have it shipped during the summer.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: A 35 day supply, at 2 a Day is 70. This VERY CLEARLY is a 60 count, 30 day display. A total lie.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: As in the title of the review, I ate two, waited an hour but never fell a sleep… took 3 more, it took a while to drift off but in the morning, I felt great.  Not the typical, grogginess wishing I could sleep longer sort of morning.  I hope I don’t need 5-6 of these every night but if so then at least I know the mornings will be pleasant. As reference, I am a 60yo male, very active, most nights it is my active brain that keeps me awake.  I use brown noise in the background and sleep next to the love of my life.  I am employed, earn well, good job and no health issues… just a very active mind. I hope this helps you choose.
ReviewTitle: Did not get me to sleep faster but felt good

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Got fully refound.
ReviewTitle: Got a bottle of melted meds.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Melatonin tends to give me weird, unpleasant dreams. For some reason, the extra strength works great. However, this last time I ordered this strength  mistake and cannot use it as it gives me those weird, unpleasant dreams.
ReviewTitle: Unpleasant reaction to melatonin this strength

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I had high hopes for these when I purchased them.  Wow! What a disappointment.  I read the reviews here and went with the ones that said these are what they needed to help them get to sleep and stay asleep with no side effects in the am. Here I am, 6 days in and up well before my alarm is set to go off. I took the recommended 2 gummies the first night. I did get sleepy but not sure if that was my really the gummies or my body.  4 hrs later I was awake. Maybe I took them too early, I thought to myself. Waited until 9pm the next night. Awake at 2am. 3rd night I took 3 gummies. I NEED SOME SLEEP!!! 4th, 5th and now the 6th night is a repeat show I can't stop. Needless to say, I either need a therapist, a doctor or stronger sleeping pills.  These gummies are no match for my body. Research will be done this weekend.  Good luck to you if you are considering buying them. Genuine good luck.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Took me a full morning to not feel dopey after taking one at 8:30 pm.  I’ve never liked the dopey feeling of meds like this.  I’d rather be able to think clearly.  Not for everyone.
ReviewTitle: Makes me dopey the next day

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: It doesn't work the greatest. I still struggled to sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I got them for my wife to get a good night sleep they did not help her

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I ordered two jars, and was able to consolidate them immediately as they are not even half full.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: They taste so awful I've only taken them once, but sleep was peaceful and I woke up feeling rested.Guess ill try taking them with water instead of chewing as much

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: It knocks me out quickly. But I am needing something to keep me sleeping through the night, and this definitely hasn't been the one to help.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Didn't know I had sleep apnea, and decided to take these because I wasn't getting good sleep.  Woke up gasping for air and probably nearly died.  After that, I found out people with undiagnosed sleep apnea should not take any form of sleep suppressants.  The more you know....
ReviewTitle: Do not take if you have might have sleep apnea

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I don't know which of the ingredients "didn't agree with me," as my grandmother used to say. It definitely made me very sleepy (took only one) and quickly. Unfortunately, I also felt out of breath and I got a bad headache and felt nauseous.Besides melatonin, the gummies contain L-Theanine, chamomile extract, passionflower extract, lemon balm extract, and then other ingredients for the gummy part I guess, such as glucose, beet sugar, gelatin, coloring from carrot and blueberrie juices, pectin, coconut oil and carnauba wax (hmmm, they used to put that in car wax back in the day).So, it could be my body had a reaction to one or more of these ingredients .  I'm not aware of any allergies to any of the ingredients, so I don't know.  I gave the product a rating of 4 stars only because of that. The company itself provides great customer service. I got a reply to my email very quickly and I got a full refund for the bottle of 110 gummies. That says a lot about their integrity.
ReviewTitle: I had a reaction to the gummies but customer support was great

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I like the product and have ordered it twice but will not order again because of the packaging that is used in the mailing. Both times the packing material has leaked all over the contents. Very poor choice for the mailing!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Product states store in a “cool area”.  Shipment was sent with an ice pack in it. Internal temperature on arrival was 96 degrees, within a minute from leaving the truck. Is this product safe to consume

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I typically use the dream sleep melatonin gummies from Pacifica which work fantastic, they have me feeling sleepy pretty quickly and I feel like I also get better sleep using them as well. Most of the time I only have to take one of them instead of the suggested serving size of two, so they’re great. Amazon didn’t have them unfortunately and since these have more doses for around the same price I figured it was a good deal. Here’s my issues:1. The bottle says to only use these once in a while which I don’t really understand2. The flavor on the photo only says blackberry, but it’s berry and mint, which I think is pretty gross personally3. I take two and am still wide awake hours later so it’s safe to say they don’t work all that wellMay just be me but since the Pacifica ones work just fine, I don’t know.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I love the taste, they help get to sleep but they give me a headache. You may need to monitor the dose to see what you can tolerate, if you are also headache prone.
ReviewTitle: Finally figured out these are giving me a headache!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: While they do work, the flavor is horrible, will not buy again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These taste amazing (which is good because I have to take quite a few to feel any effects). The amount of melatonin is very low compared to other brands. I understand that it has different ingredients as well but I wish it had more melatonin as well
ReviewTitle: Taste great but not much melatonin per serving

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Used these for about a week.The flavor wasn't great, but it's bearable. Definitely tastes like medicine in my opinion. It makes me super sleepy after about 45 minutes, which is great, but I get severe anxiety and nightmares throughout the night after using these.They make me do that thing where you start waking up once an hour feeling like you've missed your alarm. I also woke up a few times thinking there was someone standing over my bed but it was my brain still dreaming. My dreams were also vivid and unsettling.I will discontinue use. These don't work for me.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These work pretty well most of the time.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Overall I like this product. I really appreciate that it is all natural and not chemically based or habit forming. It is easy to swallow, or if you have the gummies, easy to choose and fruit-flavored. I would say that each night is a little different in how well I sleep. Not consistent. But that could be me because I've always had sleep issues. I like the product and will continue to use it.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: He usado este producto antes y fue mi primera ves que lo ordenó en línea y cuando abrí el paquete las gomitas estaban deretidas.
ReviewTitle: Producto llego derretido sin paquete frio.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: it took a while to kick in and then i struggled to wake up the entire day

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Tastes okay. Slightly difficult to chew. Some sleeping assist for half the night.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These are great and work great. However, be aware that Melotonin naturally increases blood sugar. If you are Type 2 diabetic or on the edge, beware. I am pre-diabetes (Fasting 95-105) I started getting very high fasting glucose (110-120) and after some research, realized that Melatonin can be the cause. I stopped these vitamins and my blood sugar returned to its normal range.
ReviewTitle: Taste great and definitely help you sleep, BUT

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I do think that this product helps me sleep BUT it is very harmful and misleading to label a product as gluten-free when it is marked clearly on the packaging that these are manufactured on machinery that also processes WHEAT products which means that they ARE NOT gluten free!!! Update your packaging Olly to accurately reflect your allergen status.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Tastes good and I seemed to fall asleep more easily but each time I woke up feeling groggy, even after sleeping at least 7-8 hours, which doesn’t usually happen to me. I won’t keep using it as a result. Alas, guess I’ll have to keep working on that old sleep hygiene.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: All the gummies were melted together. Ice packs were melted and boiling hot causing moisten the ups bag then on the box. Jar was wet from ice packs. Pkg was only outside for 2 hours. I would come up with different shipping solution as it's getting hotter.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I take two every night as recommended by my sister who recommended them. She feels they help her but I sent zero difference after taking these. I have a hard time staying asleep at night and maybe these really only help with falling asleep, I don’t know. That being said, they are quite tasty and I don’t regret trying them. I just don’t see myself buying them again since they don’t do what I hoped they would.
ReviewTitle: Don’t notice any chance in sleep, but are yummy

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Tried this as a cheaper alternative to my usual sleep gummy. I’ve had trouble w sleeping since experiencing a passing so it’s vital I find one that gets me feeling sleepy otherwise I’m just up. Tastes similar to licorice. This one worked about 1.5-2hrs in but noticed moving more in my sleep (use a sleep tracker that picks up on sounds). A friend tried these and said they caused them to have nightmares.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This did absolutely nothing to help me sleep I took the two gummies as prescribedEffectiveness to help me fall asleep zeroEffectiveness to help me stay asleep zero
ReviewTitle: Might as well be eating a gummy bear

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: It may work for others, but it did not for me. Not even a slight feeling of drowsiness. The gummies were not bad tasting, maybe a bit too chewy. A generic sleeping pill (nonaddictive) from the drugstore was 100% better minus any vitamin benefits.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This product didn't help me relax, or fall asleep. I basically just lost money on purchasing this product. I wouldn't repurchase this again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Have ordered these for ages, and always liked them. Most recent order tastes and smells different—is this a new formula? If so, please go back to the old one!! Batch I got is not expired, so I don’t think it’s an expiration issue.
ReviewTitle: Not a fan of new formula

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I got these because I was having trouble both falling and staying asleep, but I don’t like taking a full blown melatonin pill because it knocks me out too far and I can’t wake up. So I wanted to try these out because of the lower melatonin content, as well as I love taking gummy vitamins and I LOVE the Olly metabolism gummies. However, these taste terrible. They’re a bitter nasty taste and I can hardly stand it. I have to take them like a pill after a few chews because the flavor is so bad. Other than that, they work great and just as intended. So, if you’re fine with  tasting a lump of coal every night before bed then these are the perfect gummy for you.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I’ve been taking these for years, this bottle is different- after comparing “other ingredients” you can see their formulation has changed. I’m personally not a fan and was off put by the texture difference. However, if I wasn’t so familiar and a fan of the original maybe I wouldn’t feel so bamboozled right now. No heads up- not cool, Olly.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: i tried these because my favorite olly melatonin (the dissolve version of this) seem to be discontinued … still prefer all of the dissolve tablets over these gummies, which don’t work

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have been using Olly sleep gummies for about 5+ years now and have never had a problem and have even purchased them mostly from Amazon. This last purchase I received was odd.. I opened the lid and the seal and it smelled like chemicals or rubbing alcohol almost? It’s made me really nervous to eat them and I think I might throw them out honestly. The top of the bottle under the seal was also liquid-y and seemed like it tinted the lip of the container. I still had my old bottle of the same product and checked everything thinking maybe this was one of amazons sham products but it looks legit sadly. Only difference I noticed was the ingredients list. The old one had beet sugar, like in the description here, and the new package has sugar water instead. Not sure how big of a difference that could make but it’s the only thing that I see different. Giving 2 stars because everything seems legit, just a horrible smell when opened. Will be throwing away as I don’t want to risk ingesting something I shouldn’t.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I Love OLLY products (like Daily Energy) but not this one. It tastes bad, mild difficulty to chew and only has 3mg of Melatonin ~ a child's dose. Much better products out there for sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Gummies were shipped in a foil bag and not the plastic jar shown in the product description.  If you have used these you know they can become hard if not sealed to air.
ReviewTitle: Gummies not in the jar shown

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I love these OLLY sleep products.  They help me sleep so well.  Sometimes I have to start work at 2am, I have to go to bed by 6pm to get a good night sleep so I can work the following day from 2am to 6pm.These work great, I take them around 4pm and by 6pm I am sleeping great.  They don't give me a tired feeling the next day either.I did find a better price right after I purchased these.  As soon as I got them I tried to return them but can't.  That is my biggest part that I do not like about these.  So if you buy know they work but you can not return them even if they are un-opened.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I started taking 1 gummy a night and LOVED the sleep I experienced so much that I had this on auto-ship.  It got to the point where I kind of got dependent on it to relax and fall asleep.  (I also take L-Theanine in the morning to calm my nerves so I reckon this ingredient is what's really making me relax at night.  I'm a single mom, fulltime executive so it's better than taking valium!). While on vacation, I thought I'd take 2 a night just to get some hardcore rest...and that's when I ended up having the most messed up nightmares:  First night - I hear someone walking on my roof.  2nd night - swear to Ryan Gosling, someone is STOMPING around my bed.  3rd night - my two best friends get killed in some vivid and elaborate manner that I can't recall but man, was I soaked in sweat.  Convinced my house was haunted, I smudged the shit out of my house and did all kinds of anti-juju rituals and sleep with earplugs against The Stomper.  THEN, I read an article about how the dose for melatonin is 1gm for temporary maladjustment like jet lag.  This product has 3gm...so I was basically overdosing and tripping like a junkie, and messing up all my hormones.  I'm clean and sober now...no more boogeyman...and no more Olly.
ReviewTitle: Recommended dose is 3x too high = Nightmares!!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Description, title, and cost per serving all state 60 3mg gummies and cost is based on price per gummie.  However the package states a serving is two gummies.  So it's 60 1.5mg gummies.  Bought this as it was slightly cheaper than another product that contained 60 servings.  Since it only contains 30 servings, unlike the description and price per gummie state, it is actually significantly more expensive per serving that the other brands.Deciding to live with this rip off, I opened the package to find them all melted into one giant gummie. It’s winter. It hasn’t been above freezing in weeks. Yet they somehow melted. Very disappointing.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Love the gummie, but not strong enough for me.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I hate to write bad reviews but I am super unsatisfied with the product. I have tried these three times, the first one with two gummies (recommended serving size) and the second and third with one gummy and these give me the most terrible headache ever. This past weekend I spent it in bed because of a terrible migraine I got and I identified that the Olly gummies were associated to it. I won't be purchasing more products from this brand.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This batch smells and tastes “funny”
ReviewTitle: Usually like this.This time it’s inconsistent in taste.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: After spending a month and a half ruling out what was giving me an adverse effect, I have determined that it was this supplement.About 2-3 days into use, I noticed a very small “buzz” in the back of my eye. I assumed I was spending too much time on my phone or working. So I cut back. After a month using this, something is very wrong. The little buzz has developed into feeling like the worst sinus tension headaches I’ve ever had. I was literally losing orientation, it was so bad. I couldn’t focus on anything. I constantly felt like I was going to faint. I had already been to the doctor and ruled everything out, including COVID. He recommended I eliminate all supplements and go from there. And I did. Only after I stopped these did the issue resolve. Completely. I tossed these in the trash.I’m not sure what was going on. Bad batch? I’ve taken other melatonin with no issues. I would really caution people from taking these everyday.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Pleasant taste, but they don’t help my Nana sleep at all.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I got these because gummies taste better than pills.To my surprise these $8 gummies do not work. The cheap $.99 melatonin pills actually had me sleep 8 hours through.With these gummies I keep waking up at 5am and 6am after falling asleep at 12am, 1am. I only get about 5 hours of sleep with these gummies.These gummies are for naps, but not for going to bed. I’m going back to the melatonin tablets.Sadly a waste of money
ReviewTitle: Does not work as well as the $.99 pills

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I should have known. Most gummies you buy are just that: gummies. Where's all the herbal good stuff that these tasty little confections supposedly have? It's been denatured and displaced by sugar and gelatin. I chewed 2  as directed 30 minutes before bedtime and waited to be rocked in the arms of morpheus; the god of sleep. I finally nodded off only to awaken again at midnight, then again at 230am, then 315. Basically no change in my sleep habits. If you want candy, invest in some gummieworms. If you want a real sleep aid, go to Cvs and but some benadryl.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Really hoped these would help. Unfortunately, for me they just don’t work. Third night taking them and it’s 2am now and wide awake. Seem to keep me up rather than go to sleep. Last night it was 4am by the time I fell asleep, first night taking them I was up til 4;30am. So for me these don’t cut it, taste good but useless as a sleep aid.UPDATE: Finished the bottle and end result is they did help me fall asleep but I had to take 4 to 5 of them. I'm a big guy at 6'3, 220 so maybe that's why I needed to double dose although with the pharmaceutical store bought PM'S I only need one so I don't know. Was really looking for a more natural ingredient product but taking 4 to 5 a night does not make this practical to continue buying, again, at least for me. ReviewTitle: Keeps me wide awake, Updated below

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have trouble sleeping. I have cysts on my ovaries and sometimes the pain wakes me up at night. I end up having to take Tylenol Pm or Unisom to get back to sleep. These Olly sleep gummies were on sale, and I decided to try them. They don't taste bad. Not too sweet. The texture is good. But, my mind raced all night and I felt jittery after taking them. I kept waking up. I finally got up and took a sleeping pill. Maybe there is something in these that doesn't agree with my body. So it's a no go for me.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This product made me feel calm and sleepy, but left me feeling nauseated and with a horrible headache until noon the following day.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These don't really do anything for me and several friends I know that have also tried it. Actually, the friends that recommended them to me eventually decided that there was really no effect. Falling asleep and my quality of sleep didn't change at all while I used them, and I even went through two bottles taking the recommended dosage nightly before going to bed.The first night they seemed to work really well which originally shaped my view of them, but in retrospect I took them after a long trip and was pretty worn out from the day, so whether I had them or not, I'm sure I would have fallen right to sleep anyway. They do taste good, but at the most I think they just give a placebo effect if you're lucky.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I'm sure the product itself is good, but it took 3 days from the time it shipped to the time it arrived. Even though it had an ice pack, it couldn't withstand the long shipping time in the heat. I'll have to throw it away.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Hubby was going through rough path with sleep. We decided to try both this and the EmergenZZZZ powder to see which worked better. These gummies taste better and are more convenient than having to dissolve a powder packet, but they didn’t work well for us. We both had super weird dreams and only got about 4 hours of sleep before the effects wore off. We also tried the Neuro drinks for sleep and those are the BEST and they knock us out for 5-6 hours of good sleep, but they are damn expensive ($3.95 for a bottle which is two servings) versus powder or gummies. Also the Neuro drinks use s lot of packaging, which we hate.Maybe these gummies will work for you. For us, they are collecting dust on a shelf in the bathroom.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Every piece has a tough spot, it does what it’s supposed to but I’m pulling pieces out while eating it

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: i don’t generally respond to melatonin well so i wouldn’t bother leaving a bad review for something i figured would happen that had nothing to do with the product and everything to do with me, but completely unrelated is that the smell of these is SO strong. i opened the bottle in my room for a couple seconds to get the gummies out and ended up having to sleep in another room because the smell was so strong it was making me too nauseous to sleep. it stayed for three whole days even with the window open and fan on. and it stuck to my hands for over a day in spite of repeated washing, baking soda, rubbing with a spoon, etc. maybe i just got an amazingly potent bottle or something, idk.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I purchased the 50 pack blackberry zen flavor for sleep. Unfortunately these little gummies didn't help my daughter get good sleep at all nor did it help her stay sleep which is what she struggles with. She even tried increasing her dosage since her doctor said it was ok to try up to 10mg. She took 3 of these which were 9 mg and still not good enough.. She tried them for a week and no progress for good quality sleep for her so I will be returning them.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: It actually kept me awake. Zzzquil work best for me. I don’t like the taste of this. I’ll use it cause I don’t want to waste my money. I’ll take one then tiny bit of zzzquil

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I bought these in hopes of helping me sleeping longer. I already have sleep apnea and anxiety issues at night that make sleeping difficult. I figured I give this product a try after reading so many review. With 2 gummies, I didn't feel any noticeable effect. After the second week of not getting any effects, I double the dosage to 4 and I can feel drowsiness within an hour of taking them. I would sleep roughly 2-4 hours and that would be extent of my experience. So yes, these do help you get sleepy to go to sleep however it does not help give you a long relaxing sleep unfortunately.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The first time I try them I took two of them and they worked for me. Only the first night. Now I take 6 of them to knock me out which in one hour later or two I get tired or bored and I fall asleep. Not worth the price for its purpose nor for as snacks too. They do taste good though. Hear me out biting on them feels like I’m chewing and swallowing plastic.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I love Olly supplements, but I'm not sure the Sleep gummies work very well as someone who suffers from often and severe insomnia. They were worth a try but I probably won't buy them again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I was hoping this would help me sleep.  It did not.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I only have trouble sleeping while on vacation. I bought these solely for that purpose. I take 2 of these and don’t feel any effects. I gave it two stars bc they taste pretty good. Wish they worked for me.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I’ve tried different sleeping aids and these were cheap not I would rather spend better money on gummies that work. But I have horrible sleeping issues hence why I gave it two instead one and taste alright

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: For the past few months I have not been able to sleep. I've tried multiple OTC brands that have seldom helped me. I saw an ad for Olly and figured I'd give it a shot. I'll have to admit I haven't taken them every night, but I haven't noticed much of a change in my sleeping patterns since I've started taking the Melatonin Gummies. I plan on finishing the bottle since I prefer not to waste. I'd like to conclude that this a great late night snack but had done little for me regards to helping me get to sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This helped me less than the generic brand gummies I normally buy. I think I would need to double the dosage to help me, and at that price point it just wouldn’t be worth it. Flavor is okay - a bit funky on the end. Think I could do without the mint. But if you only need a slight help getting to sleep, these might be okay for you. They really didn’t help me get to sleep, and I woke up the normal amount of times I do in the night.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I used the product for a while to help with sleep. At first it did help me fall to sleep very quickly, overtime however I was requiring more and more gummies to fall asleep. I only weigh a hundred pounds max (yes I'm tiny) and I didn't think it would take so many gummies to put me to sleep. I ended up having to eat at least six to fall asleep, however even then I have to up the dose again. I honestly wouldn't recommend this, hopefully in the future they change their formula to something stronger.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I liked how this helped me sleep and STAY asleep. Taste wasn't bad (I'm not a big mint person - but still good). My only issue with this is that for me, I would be VERY groggy the next day. Even if I slept in on the weekends, I'd feel tired the whole day. I use the other Olly products, but this one just made me sleep a little TOO hard.This is just my experience with it. This may work great for others, this just left me too groggy and difficult to function at work.
ReviewTitle: Worked great - but had groggy side-effect

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I cannot judge if this is a good or bad product for other people, just how it effected me. Instead of helping me fall asleep, it kept me awake. I felt tired, but I just could not fall asleep. I was going to give it a one (1) star rating, but it did help to slow down my over active mind, so there is that. Again, I know melatonin works for the rest of my family so I cannot judge if these will or won't help other people, I just know they didn't do anything for me beside a help me loose even more sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: 1st I do like these, they are LOW on Melatonin but dosage is a personal choice. Looking at the bottle 4 gummies per night = 6mg of melatonin, that equals 4 GRAMS of sugar per night, 365 days in a year = 1,460 grams of sugar, 454 grams per pound of sugar, consuming these EQUALS EATING 3.2 LBS. OF SUGAR PER YEAR, that's an extra 5,616 calories per year, walking at 176 calories per hour (2mph), you have to walk an extra 32 miles to burn these off. There are other alternatives...
ReviewTitle: 4 per Night for one year = 3.2 lbs of sugar per year

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The flavor of these are terrible. It leaves an awful taste in your mouth. Also I took 2 of these a night for the past week and it did not help. I actually feel like I slept worse. Regular melatonin has worked better for me and much less expensive.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I can fall asleep but cannot stay asleep.  Was hoping by reviews that this would work.  Nope.  I even experimented with different dosages at different times.  Only difference it made was that instead of being WIDE awake in the middle of night.  I was groggy awake.  Plus they have an awful medicinal taste masked by a fruity flavor.  I prefer gummies because I hate swallowing pills but I think I would rather swallow a pill than eat these.  I will finish the bottle and keep trying but will not buy it again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Arrived melted. It had an ice pack but was put into a white bag so you can't really insulate it even with an ice pack. ‍

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My sister had these so I was looking for something tasty and good sleep. Hers tasted completely different a lot sweeter, and I just had it a week ago. I had a very bad night of sleep worse then if I took nothing. The strangest dreams and I just tossed and turned. Honestly didn’t even make me that sleepy

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I took these hoping they would help me sleep, but I actually had an awful night of sleep and kept having dreams that gave me anxiety and kept me up. I know melatonin works well for some people but for me, these made it worse.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I know all bodies react different but for me side effects have been hard. Pill works perfect, it knocks me up and I peacefully fall asleep for hours. Bad thing is next day when I wake up, I get pretty bad headaches and bad episodes of vertigo. Wasn’t sure it was related but have read other reviews of people getting vertigo and feeling dizzy. Will stop consuming the product to see if symptoms go away and will update this review.
ReviewTitle: It works but beware of side effects

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I’ve bought it several times, the product works. This time the  gummies came “melted,” so consuming them is impossible—poor storage and logistics process quality. I won’t buy it again.
