ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The truth is that you do not feel a very powerful effect in these gummies, nothing that a soothing tea cannot do, I did not like them.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: We take melatonin regularly for sleep, normally without issue.  Used this brand for on a few days and my wife had terrible nightmares each night.  Thankfully we quickly realized that the dreams started the night she started using this brand.  May not affect everyone the same but judging from other reviewers my wife was not alone in this experience.  Not sure what extra ingredient is the cause but we are tossing these for sure.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This is by far the worst sleep aid I have taken in the past 2 year. Took it at 10pm but didn't fall asleep until closer to 12midnight. The biggest issue I have though is waking up in the middle of the night and not being able to fall back asleep. Other factors for the low ratings includes the nasty medicine taste in my mouth after chewing 2 of these gummies. I drank a full glass of water and it didn't get rid of the medicine after taste. (Instructions said to chew well before swollowing)

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I haven't noticed any difference in my sleep habits taking these gummies. And the container was only 1/4 full of gummies when I opened it, meaning there is plenty of settling.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My order of OLLY arrived melted into a big glob. I was greatly disappointed
ReviewTitle: I use OLLY on a regular bsdis

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These are the nastiest vitamin gummies I've ever had. I read a ton of reviews. People like the taste, I wish someone would have been honest and told me how gross they taste and I definitely wouldn't have purchased. Now I cant return them and I hate wasting money so I'm going to have to try and push through the awful flavor. I like smarty pants gummies other olly gummies I've tried these are just not good.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: So these definitely make me sleepy however, I find it hard to stay asleep after using them. Also, I find myself having lots of short dreams while using them and lots of tossing and turning throughout the night. I would suggest trying then to see how they work for you... it was kind of a waste of money for me. I bought them because I have a hard time staying asleep and these made it worse.
ReviewTitle: These may or may not work as intended for you.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I usually love these gummies- they me sleep & taste good. I ran out of the bottle I have and bought these as a refill along with another bottle. I received the gummies today and I knew they came in a bag instead of a bottle but I didn’t know the shipper wouldn’t make sure these didn’t melt. They are not single gummies, but 1 big blob. I’m disappointed.
ReviewTitle: Love these usually BUT arrived melted into 1 blob

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: They had an odd taste which I got past. I understand that. I took two as directed. I was up all night. Next Night I took one and was not even tired. Had to take a script to sleep.I ended up giving them away.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Didn’t work for me, I saw one of the reviews saying that it worked amazing for them when others didn’t.This however, was a hit or miss moment and for me it was a 100% miss.It did the exact opposite for me.I ended up staying up for most of the night waiting for it to work.I had to resort back to weighted sleep mask and Andrew Johnson sleep app.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The product arrived in what looks like a cold packaging but it was very warm.  When opened there was 2 cold ice packs that were totally melted and hot to the touch.  When I cut open the gummy sleep pills, they too were hot and wet like they were sweating.  I have put them in the refrigerator hoping that I can reconstruct their original consistency.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: First, they arrived fast which was nice.Secondly they're black raspberry flavor, so not my favorite.I suffer with super bad insomnia and decided to give these a go because the reviews were 50/50.The first night taking them, I felt sleepy within a half hour. I was super excited to finally find something that works!Then.... The rest of the week, nothing. They didn't work. So, I'll be searching for something else.They obviously work for some and others not so much, but it's worth a try!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: This did not really work for me. I needed three or four to feel drowsy and I still used a sleeping pill to fall asleep.It also melted before it was delivered to me or en route to me. The top portion, I was able to pull off, but the bottom melted into one big blob.It may work for others, but a melatonin pill worked better for me.
ReviewTitle: Didn’t work for me and was melted

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: 2 of them do make me sleepy but I wouldn’t say “eye shutting” kind of sleepy. They give me crazy dreams and I end up waking up a lot at night because of them. During those times I feel weirdly well rested but it’ll be like 4am. Sometimes they give me painful headaches but not all the time, and I know it’s this because that’s not a problem I had before. They also taste really bitter and not good. Overall I wouldn’t recommend these.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have insomnia And this product didn't really work well for me as some cbd gummy melatonin i have took in the past. I srooped taking cbd gummies bc of the price, but i might have to go back on that. The flavor isnt as good either, but i dont care about that because it only last a few seconds. Needless to say, I will be looking elsewhere

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: They taste great and have a pleasant mouthfeel. I give it two stars because for me, it had the opposite reaction in that it kept me a wake. It made me sleepy but I either slept badly or not at all. It felt like I was awake the whole night. I tried it three nights and then chucked them. I hope this isn't the regular result for most people. I'm writing to let people know so if they have that issue too, they know they aren't alone.
ReviewTitle: They taste great and have a pleasant mouthfeel

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: First i would like to say WARNING! to whomever thinks melatonin is safe and entrusts these random companies to deliver. I will start by saying since i found melatonin to be the natural alternative to known sleep aids, naturally i put it on the top of my list.  Before i explain my personal side effects id like to leave this quote from wikipedia regarding melatonin in general.
ReviewTitle: Causes headaches and an increased risk of dementia. According  to studies.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have suffered from insomnia for quite some time.  It is rare that I sleep thru the night.  I had high hopes for these gummies after reading all the reviews.  I can honestly say they are delicious but they did nothing to provide me with a good nights sleep.  My search continues!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: It doesn't help me sleep for more than 4 hours.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: NO TIENE SABOR, SON FÁCIL DE MASTICAR, PERO NADA EFECTIVAS EN SU ACCIÓN, EN MI OPINIÓN NO LAS RECOMIENDO.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I was really hopeful about this product.  I have always had an issue with waking up in the middle of the night and not being able to fall asleep.  This product definitely helped me relax to fall asleep, but then I was only able to sleep 1-3 hours.  Tastes great and no “hungover “feeling in the morning.
ReviewTitle: Only helps fall asleep, not stay asleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My husband and I tried this product in hopes of obtaining a more deep sleep naturally. Each time we have used this product we have had interesting dreams. We both didn't feel like it helped us sleep deeper. I have tired other olly products and like them much more than this one. Don't know that I will but again for the price.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I’m not even sure if it works as I could not try them since they arrived all melted and turned into one big blob. I was able to break away a couple but they tasted terrible. I have used Olly stress gummies and love the flavor and how they work but these for sleep were just terrible. Taste made me nauseous.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The listing says 4 mg, but these are 3 mg melatonin gummies! They did not help me sleep. I have had success with a 5 mg formulation like this, so I had higher expectations. Maybe it’s the missing milligrams.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: After a week of taking these gummy I’ve realized they don’t work for me. Was up in the wee hours & paid for it during the afternoons I could barely keep my eyes open

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have been using Olly sleep gummies for about 5+ years now and have never had a problem and have even purchased them mostly from Amazon. This last purchase I received was odd.. I opened the lid and the seal and it smelled like chemicals or rubbing alcohol almost? It’s made me really nervous to eat them and I think I might throw them out honestly. The top of the bottle under the seal was also liquid-y and seemed like it tinted the lip of the container. I still had my old bottle of the same product and checked everything thinking maybe this was one of amazons sham products but it looks legit sadly. Only difference I noticed was the ingredients list. The old one had beet sugar, like in the description here, and the new package has sugar water instead. Not sure how big of a difference that could make but it’s the only thing that I see different. Giving 2 stars because everything seems legit, just a horrible smell when opened. Will be throwing away as I don’t want to risk ingesting something I shouldn’t.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I Love OLLY products (like Daily Energy) but not this one. It tastes bad, mild difficulty to chew and only has 3mg of Melatonin ~ a child's dose. Much better products out there for sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I'm sure the product itself is good, but it took 3 days from the time it shipped to the time it arrived. Even though it had an ice pack, it couldn't withstand the long shipping time in the heat. I'll have to throw it away.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Arrived melted. It had an ice pack but was put into a white bag so you can't really insulate it even with an ice pack. ‍

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I buy Olly Gummies...Olly Beauty Gummies truly work. My hair grows much quicker, I need weekly barbershop visits now. I decided to use the Olly Sleep Gummies. They work and get me sleepy -BUT be careful. Everyone reacts differently to medications, I always end up with a pounding migraine when I wake. It never fails. I try hydrating a lot before sleeping when taking these sleep Gummies..still never stops the migraine. Just be careful when taking these if you’re susceptible to headaches like I am.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

I just don’t see myself buying them again since they don’t do what I hoped they would.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: These don't really do anything for me and several friends I know that have also tried it. Actually, the friends that recommended them to me eventually decided that there was really no effect. Falling asleep and my quality of sleep didn't change at all while I used them, and I even went through two bottles taking the recommended dosage nightly before going to bed.The first night they seemed to work really well which originally shaped my view of them, but in retrospect I took them after a long trip and was pretty worn out from the day, so whether I had them or not, I'm sure I would have fallen right to sleep anyway. They do taste good, but at the most I think they just give a placebo effect if you're lucky.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: i don’t generally respond to melatonin well so i wouldn’t bother leaving a bad review for something i figured would happen that had nothing to do with the product and everything to do with me, but completely unrelated is that the smell of these is SO strong. i opened the bottle in my room for a couple seconds to get the gummies out and ended up having to sleep in another room because the smell was so strong it was making me too nauseous to sleep. it stayed for three whole days even with the window open and fan on. and it stuck to my hands for over a day in spite of repeated washing, baking soda, rubbing with a spoon, etc. maybe i just got an amazingly potent bottle or something, idk.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I bought these in hopes of helping me sleeping longer. I already have sleep apnea and anxiety issues at night that make sleeping difficult. I figured I give this product a try after reading so many review. With 2 gummies, I didn't feel any noticeable effect. After the second week of not getting any effects, I double the dosage to 4 and I can feel drowsiness within an hour of taking them. I would sleep roughly 2-4 hours and that would be extent of my experience. So yes, these do help you get sleepy to go to sleep however it does not help give you a long relaxing sleep unfortunately.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The first time I try them I took two of them and they worked for me. Only the first night. Now I take 6 of them to knock me out which in one hour later or two I get tired or bored and I fall asleep. Not worth the price for its purpose nor for as snacks too. They do taste good though. Hear me out biting on them feels like I’m chewing and swallowing plastic.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: For the past few months I have not been able to sleep. I've tried multiple OTC brands that have seldom helped me. I saw an ad for Olly and figured I'd give it a shot. I'll have to admit I haven't taken them every night, but I haven't noticed much of a change in my sleeping patterns since I've started taking the Melatonin Gummies. I plan on finishing the bottle since I prefer not to waste. I'd like to conclude that this a great late night snack but had done little for me regards to helping me get to sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

People like the taste, I wish someone would have been honest and told me how gross they taste and I definitely wouldn't have purchased. Now I cant return them and I hate wasting money so I'm going to have to try and push through the awful flavor. I like smarty pants gummies other olly gummies I've tried these are just not good.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Product came shipped fine and does the trick for the most part. What I wasn't expecting was the flavor. BlackBerry would have been a great flavor but they added mint so it tastes like cherry cough medicine. If I had known it was going to taste like that would never have bought these.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I bought these gummy‘s because I had taken melatonin in the past and it helped me have a good nights sleep. However I’m not sure if it’s the other ingredients and herbs in this mixture but I had a really strange reaction to it. I had a couple bad nights sleep in a row and was feeling rather exhausted. I took two gummy‘s at 9 PM. Within about a half an hour I felt like I was drunk and was saying odd things to my daughter who kept asking me what was wrong with me. I was super drowsy and eventually by 10 o’clock fell asleep. It wasn’t a restful deep sleep though, it was more like a drugged, psychotic, in an out, restless sleep. I woke up at 4 AM with my mouth as dry as the desert and chugged water.  At 5 AM my dog needed to go out and just getting up out of bed and walking her outside I felt like I was in another dimension. Totally out of it. Then I fell back asleep into the most scariest, relaxed state I’ve ever felt. I felt like I couldn’t move my body, my breathing was very shallow and slow and my heart rate was slow. I almost had to remind myself to breathe. Ever since I got up at 6:45 I have felt groggy all morning. Again, I’ve never had this reaction with just straight melatonin, so it must be the other ingredients in this mix that didn’t agree with me. I would be very cautious taking this.
ReviewTitle: Felt drugged and weird all night

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I bought these and did question the reason for the companies label. It is spelled out clearly these are for “occasional” sleep support. Apparently not every night. Yet, I took them every night for five nights in a row. They work very well without any groggy feeling in the morning. Yet, the last night I took these I laid down and got comfortable. My ear started ringing. It didn’t stop. I fell asleep knowing it would go away because it was caused by these gummies. I have never in my life experienced this.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Great for putting you to sleep but quickly wears off, making it difficult to get back to sleep.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I love the ingredients and it gave me quality sleep. I rated this product low because I just realized it has one gram of sugar per gummy. Yikes! They should figure out a way to make it without any unnecessary sugar.
ReviewTitle: One gram of sugar per gummy!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: They were average. I woke up 3 times during the night & they frequently upset my stomach.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I have been using Olly sleep gummies for about 5+ years now and have never had a problem and have even purchased them mostly from Amazon. This last purchase I received was odd.. I opened the lid and the seal and it smelled like chemicals or rubbing alcohol almost? It’s made me really nervous to eat them and I think I might throw them out honestly. The top of the bottle under the seal was also liquid-y and seemed like it tinted the lip of the container. I still had my old bottle of the same product and checked everything thinking maybe this was one of amazons sham products but it looks legit sadly. Only difference I noticed was the ingredients list. The old one had beet sugar, like in the description here, and the new package has sugar water instead. Not sure how big of a difference that could make but it’s the only thing that I see different. Giving 2 stars because everything seems legit, just a horrible smell when opened. Will be throwing away as I don’t want to risk ingesting something I shouldn’t.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I Love OLLY products (like Daily Energy) but not this one. It tastes bad, mild difficulty to chew and only has 3mg of Melatonin ~ a child's dose. Much better products out there for sleep

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My experience is not to downplay this product but is to share with others to make you aware that every thing is not for everybody. My experience trying this product was very very scary. Before I purchased it I read all of the reviews the majority were positive and just a few negative experiences. For me my experience was very scary. After 20 minutes of taking the product could have been 15 minutes of taking the product I began to feel real nauseated severely nauseated and extremely dizzy. So I thought I better Google to see what the side effects this product may have and both were listed, may cause dizziness and nausea. I became so sick I thought I was going to actually have to go to ER but I got enough strength to go to my bedroom and lay down for a while and the nausea and the dizziness just intensified. This is all true this is not a makeup story. This is my personal experience of trying this product. Again this is not to downplay the product because everybody body operates and functions differently. After laying down praying God don't let me die take away this feeling and finally I got up and was able to get something salty to try to kind of help the nausea. I drink some water and got something a little salty that helped a little bit. And finally I fell a little bit better and after a couple hours then I felt finally fell asleep. But after getting up this morning I feel a whole lot better than what I did last night but I still feel the residue of the nausea real sensitive stomach and still a little bit of dizziness. So again I'm sharing this to say do your research you know the only way you got to know more or less per se is to try it but if you know that you may be a little sensitive I wouldn't give it a try. I've used other products by OLLY and they have been very beneficial but I never tried the ones as a sleep aid. The product isn't cheap and I spent close to $80 or $70 dollars, but because I feel so much better today, I can care less about getting a refund. That's, just how sick it made me. Hopefully, it Works for you!

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I started taking these gummies as directed, one or two at bedtime. Two days later I started getting an extremely painful headache that would not go away. I was very worried because I do not normally have headaches. On day four I realized the only thing that was different on my daily routine was these gummies. I stopped taking them immediately and the next day the headaches gradually went away. I do not recommend these gummies.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I was looking for a product that would help me relax before bedtime and sleep more soundly through the night. Because melatonin is sold over the counter as a dietary supplement, I expected this product to be fairly innocuous. Boy was I wrong. Within 10-15 minutes of taking just one 3mg gummy, I felt as if I had been drugged and was losing muscle control. The effects were unexpectedly potent and uncomfortable. I noticed my breathing had become more shallow and I had to consciously remind myself to take deeper breaths. The unexpected effects sent me into a mild panic and I was afraid of what would happen if I fell asleep. I felt drowsy but purposely kept myself awake for a couple hours until I started to feel the effects of the melatonin begin to lessen.I slept well through the night, but felt groggy, heavy and oddly depressed most of the next day. When I woke up, I was alarmed to see that there were 2 notifications on my smart watch from the middle of the night alerting me that my heart rate had twice dropped below 45 bpm for over 10 minutes while I slept. This is extremely concerning because my resting heart rate is usually in the 60’s and I have no history of cardiac issues.I would strongly advise everyone to use this product with caution and treat it as you would a prescription medication. In fact, some countries like the UK actually require a prescription for melatonin. Consulting with your physician prior to taking any sleep aid would be prudent, even if it is sold OTC, especially if you have any pre-existing medical conditions or take any other medications. All drugs affect everyone differently and you don't want to be caught off guard with some of the potential effects.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Per Amazon, I’ve bought this product 39 times. I’ve been using this for years and it is on my automatic subscriptions. It recently went out of stock for awhile and the subscription order was finally fulfilled. Just opened the new bag and I literally spit them out because I thought they had gone bad. Go on the internet. Nope, they just changed the formulation. Super upsetting and may have to discontinue because I genuinely cannot eat these.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Contains titanium dioxide. Banned in most other countries. The FDA last looked at it in 1966.Can cause long term adverse health conditions.
ReviewTitle: Contains titanium dioxide a forever chemicle

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I read reviews on here and read the negative reviews as well as the positive—given the low price I decided to take a gamble and see if these worked for me. They did not. Initially, I fell asleep fairly fast, but about 3 hours in, I woke up with racing heart and palpitations, just like others had experienced.I was looking for a cheaper solution to Charlotte’s Web CBD Sleep Gummies, but I now realize you get what you pay for.Also, the taste was not great. Unfortunately, you can’t return these or get a refund, so my suggestion is that you go straight to Charlottes Web for their sleep gummies, they work awesome.To the Olly company: My review would have been different if I could at least get a refund—I’m happy to pay for things that actually work. If you offered refunds, people are less likely to give you negative reviews and drive customers to other brands. Just food for thought.
ReviewTitle: It’s a gamble. For some it works, for me it was the opposite.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I only took one gummy and about 20 minutes later, after drifting to sleep, I woke up with my heart racing! I felt anxiety and fear. I also had some type of weird dream. My mouth became very dry. I had to get up and take deep breaths and lots of water to calm myself back down. My hands were shaky as well. I don’t know what in the ingredients of this gummy causes such a bad reaction, but my body does not like this product. Although this product affects everyone differently, it didn’t work well for me in terms of keeping me asleep and the bad effects I experienced. I remained awake after that for about two hours. I was so tired but still couldn’t sleep due to my body feeling anxious and my heart rate having been disrupted. I’m not sure why only one gummy had such a strong effect on me. The serving size is 2. I am a lightweight, so maybe it was that. Use this product with caution and maybe start with one, to see how your body responds to it and how well it works.
ReviewTitle: Bad Experience of Racing Heart Rate

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Ive taken many otc as well as prescription meds to deal with my insomnia.  3mg melatonin, the quantity contained in this product, has never made me feel overtly sleepy but used in combination with valerian and CBD oil, Im usually able to fall asleep.  However I usually awaken 4 hours later and will sometimes either white knuckle it till dawn or pop a low dose ambien.  So, I'm  familiar with the effects and side effects of most sleep products. I stopped taking diphenhydramine (bendadryl)  due to the confusion and drowsiness Id experience the next day from its anticholinergic properties.Olly sleep gummies are a puzzle to me.  A half hour or a little less after chewing them I started stumbling around as if Id had 2 stiff martinis.  I felt drunk and stoned and not in a good way, and yet when I turned the lights out sleep didnt happen for quite awhile and when it did I awoke a few hours later only to  take an ambien.  This stuff made it harder for me to sleep.  I dont know what is in there to cause this strong and strange result, but Im going to stay away.. The next day until late in the day I felt hungover and strung out.Its not the melatonin. Passion flower?  Can it have that strong an effect?  Im puzzled.
ReviewTitle: Made me feel drunk but not in a good way

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I normally don't leave product reviews on Amazon, but these gummies were so useless that I just have to share my experience. The original brand I had a subscription for (Complete Blue) no longer sells their products on Amazon, so Amazon automatically recommended Olly to me as a replacement. I figured sure, why not? I see these bottles in CVS all the time and I've been curious to try them out – plus I'm a sucker for a good-tasting gummy.And by god, my sleeping actually got WORSE. With my other supplements I'd be knocked out in about 30 mins, tops, but with these gummies I've been falling asleep at 4am for a week straight. It was only until I took a closer look at the bottle that I saw there's sugar in it, which...sugar right before bed? It's 2 grams, which is the equivalent of half a teaspoon. Doesn't seem like much but if you're taking these right before you're trying to fall asleep, that feels counterproductive. The first two ingredients listed under the "other ingredients" section are also glucose syrup (more sugar) and beet sugar, so you do the math.All in all, totally useless supplements. I normally hate wasting things, but this bottle's going right in the figurative garbage (and maybe the literal one too).

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

ReviewContent: To be honest, these were reasonably effective for me and I had bought them on three different occasions but just noticed that between the product I ordered in January and the one I ordered in May, they started adding canola, which as people are increasingly aware, is a toxic industrial solvent that is terrible for humans.  Like many, I get severe digestive issues from canola, and I strongly urge the company to reconsider their ingredient list change.
ReviewTitle: Beware!  New ingredient list includes Industrial Solvent

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I know everyone responds differently to things. This was one of the scariest night sleeps of my life. I have been weaning off of my sleep meds and wanted to switch to something "natural" for a bit before coming completely off.  I only took 1 gummy VS 2 and it was a horrible experience.  Within a half hour a starting sweating and felt drugged and knocked out fast. I then kept falling in and out of horrible frightening vivid dreams. When I was awake I was so paranoid, groggy, had a headache, and this horrible "doom" feeling. I kept forcing myself to sleep in Hope's I could sleep it off because I was in panic mode being awake. I'd go directly into another horrible dream when I fell asleel. I was restless the whole night. The intensity was a little lighter each time I woke up. I was miserable until about 4pm the next day. I'm so glad I only took 1 because if I took 2 I probably would have had my boyfriend take me to the ER. I dont know what in it made everything so bad for me, but they should not have an over the counter product that can affect some people this severe.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count

When I arrived at my destination jet lagged I took another dose thinking I was just tired from traveling. I quickly developed stomach cramps, nausea, was dizzy and felt horrible. I haven’t been able to eat, I haven’t take them in 24 hours and I still I feel awful. I would not take these. Not sure if I got a dupe or if this melatonin is not easily tolerated, but either way do not take.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: The stars are for the delivery issues (and please understand I'm a big Amazon fan):  the product arrived inside a crinkly metallic sack with a cold pack in it, but the cold pack was HOT and wet (oozing stuff) and this stuff got all over the jar.  UGH.  I've washed the jar, but the gummies look wet and melted themselves inside the jar.  I understand that it's very, very hot  and perhaps July 4th held up the delivery---but since I said "No Rush" shipping, then holding it till after the holiday would have been fine.  Anyway, I am debating what to do with the gummies.  The gross aspect of the package makes using them very unappealing.  I don't often have issues with Amazon products, but this was a definite negative.P.S. I'd give this product, which I've used before a 3.5 - 4.0 for effectiveness.  I use it in conjunction with another natural sleep aid and most of the time it gets me some sleep and that's good.  Because without help, I don't sleep well at all.  So the product is worth trying to see if it works for you.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: So ordered these to try them out and see if they worked any better or differently than my standard 5mg gummies from walmart.They never made me sleepy and went and got more from Walmart. These gummies not only taste awful but made me sick. Took 2 as recommended on the bottle and the first day was ok. The next day took 2 again and woke up with insane heart burn... my stomach hasn't been the same since days later. Took me 5 days to figure out why I feel so sick. The only thing I changed was eating these. Now I can barely eat anything without feeling sick as my stomach tries to repair from the worst acid reflux in my life. I've already missed out on working from being sick. At least I figured out wtf caused it so I can stop taking it and already 2 days not taking it and my stomach has improved but still not normal yet. If you have a problem with digestion I don't suggest these.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: Had my first experience taking Melatonin last night and it was with these gummies. I’m sure they’re great, my daughter slept beautifully on them. Apparently I’m one of those patients who has traumatic nightmares on Melatonin. Slept until 2:30 in the morning and have been awake since and even got to go to work today! Never again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: I was looking forward to this product so I hopefully would have a deep good sleep.  But, NO. Also, I noticed when I took it the inside of my mouth felt numb.  Really, please do not take it.  Thank you.

ReviewContent: This isn't about the product but about the unnecessary waste generated in shipping something that is ostensibly packaged in a way to reduce waste. I like Olly products because I'm not a real grown up and would rather have gummy candy than swallow a pill. Their vitamin bottles are fairly stylish but also a lot of plastic, so I was thrilled to be able to refill them with something that uses a lot less packaging. I couldn't find it locally, only on Amazon. For no good reason, they're shipping this shelf-stable product in enormous padded, insulated bags meant for refrigerated items. It's such a waste and offsets any environmental benefit of buying a refill.
ReviewTitle: Product is great, Packaging/shipping is ridiculous

ReviewContent: After reading the rave reviews about this product, and drawn to it's natural ingredients, I decided to try it. I often wake up between 3-4am, and stay awake for a minimum of 1 hour and often don't fall back asleep.I took 2 chewables at 9:30pm last night, and for the very first time I never fell asleep. I didn't feel drugged, I just laid awake - all night. It was horrendous and I am exhausted. I read in a review that they gave someone else a stomach ache, and likewise I had an adverse reaction that kept me awake.  For $12 I'm not going to send them back, but I will NOT be experimenting with them again.

ProductTitle: OLLY Sleep Gummy, Occasional Sleep Support, 3 mg Melatonin, L-Theanine, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Sleep Aid, Blackberry - 70 Count
ReviewContent: My experience is not to downplay this product but is to share with others to make you aware that every thing is not for everybody. My experience trying this product was very very scary. Before I purchased it I read all of the reviews the majority were positive and just a few negative experiences. For me my experience was very scary. After 20 minutes of taking the product could have been 15 minutes of taking the product I began to feel real nauseated severely nauseated and extremely dizzy. So I thought I better Google to see what the side effects this product may have and both were listed, may cause dizziness and nausea. I became so sick I thought I was going to actually have to go to ER but I got enough strength to go to my bedroom and lay down for a while and the nausea and the dizziness just intensified. This is all true this is not a makeup story. This is my personal experience of trying this product. Again this is not to downplay the product because everybody body operates and functions differently. After laying down praying God don't let me die take away this feeling and finally I got up and was able to get something salty to try to kind of help the nausea. I drink some water and got something a little salty that helped a little bit. And finally I fell a little bit better and after a couple hours then I felt finally fell asleep. But after getting up this morning I feel a whole lot better than what I did last night but I still feel the residue of the nausea real sensitive stomach and still a little bit of dizziness. So again I'm sharing this to say do your research you know the only way you got to know more or less per se is to try it but if you know that you may be a little sensitive I wouldn't give it a try. I've used other products by OLLY and they have been very beneficial but I never tried the ones as a sleep aid. The product isn't cheap and I spent close to $80 or $70 dollars, but because I feel so much better today, I can care less about getting a refund. That's, just how sick it made me. Hopefully, it Works for you!

I'll reorder in October!

Better off to use pure essential oils for better sleep.
